premise:
Background Music: “Adolescents” by Incubus.

No one who pays attention to celestial matters ever claims to know where events of great import will be beyond doubt. We can make reasonable guesses, take actions that push certain responses, even engineer happenings among humanity. But only a fool claims to really know what will be. 
And if they do? Well, let’s just say that if predestination does exist, it sure doesn’t care much in giving warning to either Heaven or Hell.

Many Angels and Demons live and perform their tasks in the city of Edmonton, and they find varying degrees of satisfaction there, either serving Heaven or Hell – or simply serving themselves. And though they all have a fairly clear idea of the big picture (as far as either Heaven or Hell see it), no one in the city ever dreamed the that the scale of events would be so staggering, nor that it would take its origin both from the lost regions of the Marches, and Heaven and Hell’s greatest kept collective secret.

Despite this, our story begins with a motley crew of beings, each involved with their own comings and goings, with shaping lives and hearts with their actions and intentions – and though they do not realize it now, they will be the ones destined (or fated) to involve themselves in what could be the greatest cataclysm the Symphony has ever known.

The city of Edmonton.

It is the November 30th, 2021, and winter has begun in earnest.

It will be remembered as the year when the skies turned to brass.

My name and title are given as “the Recorder,” and i will be your narrator.

To learn more about the *In Nomine* setting, you can visit the Steve Jackson Games website at http://in-nomine.sjgames.com and discover further story and mechanics-based elements about the tabletop roleplaying game on which this world is based.

premise:
I do not know if anyone else on Storium has attempted this, but I am opening up a way for creative people to come together to make a new, DETAILED and SELF-CONSISTENT world that can be used for Storium games, long before the actual playing of the game, as well make a world that can used for any other creative endeavor. This has been done previously in the world of fiction book writers with the shared universe concept, leading to long series of novels and story collections, such as Thieves’ World and 1632. Many of the great IPs have used multiple writers to expand their universe, such as Star Wars, Babylon 5, Forgotten Realms, and the Cthulhu Mythos. This project is different in that those who want to use it will not have to pay the traditional license fees. If this goes very well, this co-created world will lead to fan-fiction on individual websites, published stories and novels, and perhaps greater projects. 

One major drawback to having multiple writers is that the canon can be decimated by conflicting versions of the setting and elements, which is frustrating to all. Just look at all of the reboots of the DC comic universe, or even the recent multiple reboots just in the Spider-Man movie franchise. That is why an overall editor is needed. I humbly nominate myself—my project, my sensibilities will the final arbiter, though I hope that it will be considered a light touch, and I will make every attempt to be fair and gentle. I also submit for free the PROCESS to anyone else who wants to create their own world—take a look at the following, and see if you would like to join in this experiment and/or create your own for other genres. 

We will create a world with detail, which means there will be some give and take on ideas, as we mash various ideas over and over, in order to fit all concepts together logically. A team player mentality is necessary. We also need originality, so, though this may be inspired by many previous IPs (intellectual properties) such as Deadlands, the driving elements must be new. For example, magic is part of this world, but we will not be taking the fear mechanic from Deadlands that morphs the environment when the Reckoners have put enough fright into the local populace. That story element belongs to Pinnacle Entertainment, originated by their writers, and bless them for creating it for their universe. This will be an original world, created with original ideas, and must be different from what has been done before. 

Before going further, I will give the legal foundation, which explains the way in which this is different than most other collaborative creative activities, then delve into the beginning of the story elements. 


META-STORY PARTICIPATION

Contributors, and creators of derivative works, by the act of participation, are agreeing to the following terms.

Contributors release the intellectual property claims to anyone who uses their contributions regarding invented technology, gadgets, timeline, history, events, and organizations. There will be a list of specifically released world important characters, otherwise, characters remain the property of their creator, except in a use of mere reference. No one may use someone else’s created characters unless it has been specified as a released character, except as in a minor reference. No one may recreate someone else’s stories, nor use their created dialogue.

Anyone may propose to create their own stories from this setting, using the above released elements for their own use, and release for free or profit from their own story creations in any medium, including, but not restricted to: posting on the internet; Storium games; printed and electronic role playing games; providing a story to a print or electronic magazine; publishing an electronic or printed book of a story of any length; contributing a story or stories to an anthology of fiction; create a collection of stories; radio shows; podcasts; television series or movies; a script for a motion picture. 

Some of the conditions to creating works in this universe are those found on the website run by John M. Portley, the instigator of this project, who holds the copyrights to this universe. At this moment, his website regarding this project is:

http://www.john-m-portley.com

Permission to participate in creating works in this universe begins by communicating with John M. Portley regarding the medium to be used, the title and branding to be used, and whether payment will be made or value exchanged in the publishing and/or performance of the work. Notification of any payment is to communicated to John M. Portley within one month of payment. If compensation continues to be given to the author for the creative work, then updates of the on-going compensation must occur every three months.  

Swearing is not to be present within any works of this universe, nor acts of a sexual nature. Titles and branding must be changed if the copyright holder deems it an infringement of another’s on-going or proposed title or branding, or if it considered in bad taste by the copyright holder, John M. Portley, or his legal representatives. 

If an individual or collective profits from a creation that is set in this collaborative world, then ten percent of the revenue of that creation will be given to a legal charity, of the author’s choice, and proof of the income and gift to charity must be provided to John M. Portley, or his legal representatives within one month of that charity payment. 

The charity payment must be made once annually, at the least.

Failure to the stated conditions is surrendering the right to publish anything within this created world, any and all profits from using this setting are to be forfeited to John M. Portley, and will subject transgressors to legal prosecution for infringement, defamation, and court fees.

META-STORY—STEAMPUNK WEIRD WEST

Though I want to keep this open to most ideas, and encourage all to think outside of the box, I do have a couple of caveats upfront. I do not enjoy stories that take away a character's free will. I really do not see the point. So, in the desire to have consistency, the first guideline of this world is that mind control is something that will not be possible more than it is in our present world, and, by association, reading of minds. Time travel is not possible by any method in this universe. Aside from that, please generate ideas, even the crazy ones, and let's see what will work well together. 

What marvels of transportation and manufacturing occurred? What technology or alternative science developed? 

What mythological elements or elements of magic are true in this setting?  

Because of the above alternative history, what organizations and conflicts have developed?

Because of the above, what set of events occurred, and what were the repercussions?  

Who are the important individuals in this world—the movers and shakers?  Let's create a list of people important on this world stage that others can use. 

With each suggestion, let's work together to flesh out the idea, and see what works well together. 

If this world is built up by numerous contributors, then I will create a wiki website at a timely junction to collect the elements into an encyclopedia of this world. 

Please put questions to the Narrator in the Commentary section. Please suggest new ideas or tweaks to previous ideas in the Scene area. Just start a character with some references for yourself, such as country and a brief background of time wasters such as your various jobs in your life and what particular entertainments that you enjoy (yes, I will require to know something about the individuals with which I will be sharing a world). Let’s see how many characters a Storium game can take!
story:
Name: The Clockwork West

Outline: In the steampunk weird west world of The Clockwork West, the story begins with the introduction of the main character, a young inventor named Amelia who has been working on a revolutionary new form of transportation. She is determined to win the upcoming technology competition in the bustling city of New Babbage. As she prepares for the competition, she encounters a mysterious stranger who seems to have an interest in her invention, but also harbors a dark secret.







Amelia's unease continued to grow as the competition progressed. She couldn't shake the feeling that the stranger was somehow manipulating the events to his advantage, but she had no proof. Her airship drew a lot of attention, and she noticed the stranger lurking around, talking to the judges and other competitors. It was as if he was trying to sabotage her chances of winning. Despite her growing suspicions, Amelia remained focused on presenting her invention to the best of her ability. As the day drew to a close, she was relieved that the competition was over, but little did she know that the real challenge was only just beginning.

Amelia's mind raced as she tried to make sense of the evidence she had found. The realization that the stranger had tampered with the competition results filled her with a mix of anger and determination. She knew she had to take matters into her own hands and uncover the truth behind the stranger's actions. As she made her way back to her workshop, she couldn't shake the feeling that she was entangled in a web of deception and danger far beyond what she initially thought. Her thoughts were consumed by the need to unravel the mystery and bring the stranger to justice. Little did she know that her quest for the truth would lead her into a world filled with unexpected allies, perilous obstacles, and shocking revelations.

Amelia knew she had to act fast. Determined to gather more proof against the stranger, she hatched a bold plan to infiltrate a secret gathering of influential figures in the city. Disguising herself as a member of the serving staff, she slipped into the opulent ballroom where the event was being held, her heart pounding with a heady mix of fear and excitement. As she moved through the crowd, she kept her ears open, hoping to catch any scrap of information that would shed light on the stranger's motives and actions. The atmosphere crackled with tension and intrigue as she eavesdropped on conversations and observed the interactions between the city's elite. Just as she was beginning to lose hope, she overheard a hushed conversation that sent chills down her spine. It seemed that the stranger was part of a clandestine group with far-reaching influence and nefarious intentions. Her mind reeled with the implications of what she had discovered, and she knew that she had stumbled upon something far more dangerous than she had ever imagined. As she made her way out of the gathering, the weight of the knowledge she now possessed bore down on her, and she realized that she had unwittingly become entangled in a web of danger and deceit that extended far beyond the confines of the city.

Amelia's heart raced as she made her way through the dimly lit streets of New Babbage. premise:
A thin folder was found between the wall and a vintage desk dating back to the 50s during the clean up of a metaphysical disaster in 2018 at one of the black buildings on Los Alamos campus.

The first page of the file contains a mimeo of an untranslated, highly encrypted note.  There is no need to redact it, because only those with specific ciphers, and a magical decoder artifact that was created for the specific purpose are able to read the text.  And the  last of those decoders had been destroyed in the 1980s.

_My friends_
_I believe I have located the item we misplaced during our African vacation and it may be in better condition than we originally thought.  Please meet one of my "friends" at the coordinates below on May 21, 1951 at 15:00 Zulu.  RSVP Requested. Courier will wait_

The rest of the file was heavily redacted.  Photos are so yellowed with age and exposure as to be impossible to decipher.

--------

This is the tale of the actions and consequences of a small group of soon to be former TAC operatives, their friends and hirelings who went off the books in order to rescue a comrade that was left behind.

----
**More Information**

This is a follow on to TAC: Case File Crusade wherein a small group of TAC members, after botching a mission, return to Algiers to rescue a comrade they had to leave behind.

Admission is not limited to those who were in Crusade, but the basics of what happened might be useful there.  Admission is NOT limited to TAC members either, this mission is so black it's 'off the book' (or possibly so off the book, it's black) so there is reason for any number of people in the US, France and Algiers to have become involved.

However only members of the original mission have the ciphers to read the note, anybody else who joins will have been brought on by one of the members of the original mission.

----


**Setting**

During the winter of 1950, with the eye of the government on stopping Communism, a small operation of the even smaller Abnormal Occurrence Threat Assessment and Containment branch of the minuscule and highly secret US Department of Abnormal Occurrences headed to North Africa to capture a Nazi asset who was now a member of a secret cult of knights with magical or psychic ties.

Intel proved to be poor and the team inexperienced, so that mission failed, resulting in severe injury to one member and the capture of another.

For political and other reasons only apparent to the top Brass, a rescue mission is not sanctioned.  Much to the anger of those forced to leave the operative behind.

Not quite 8 months' later, one of TAC's operatives in Algiers hears the right things from the right people and reaches out.

**Also in 1951**
January 4 – Korean War: Third Battle of Seoul: Chinese and North Korean forces capture Seoul for the second time (they had lost Seoul in the Second Battle of Seoul in September 1950).
January 15 – In a court in West Germany, Ilse Koch, The "Witch of Buchenwald", wife of the commandant of the Buchenwald concentration camp, is sentenced to life imprisonment.
January 27 – Nuclear testing at the Nevada Test Site begins, with a 1-kiloton bomb dropped on Frenchman Flat, northwest of Las Vegas.
January 31 – The United States' last narrow gauge passenger train (the "San Juan Express") ends service.
February 1 – The United Nations General Assembly declares that China is an aggressor in the Korean War, in United Nations General Assembly Resolution 498.
February 12 – Muhammad Reza Shah (Shah of Iran) marries Soraya Esfandiary-Bakhtiari.
February 27 – The Twenty-second Amendment to the United States Constitution, limiting Presidents to two terms, is ratified.
March 6 - April 5 – The trial of Julius and Ethel Rosenberg for conspiracy to commit espionage in the United States resulting in their conviction and death sentence.
March 12 – Hank Ketcham's best-selling comic strip Dennis the Menace appears in newspapers across the United States for the first time.
April 11 - U.S. President Harry S. Truman relieves General Douglas MacArthur of his Far Eastern commands.
May 3 - King George VI opens London's Royal Festival Hall and the Festival of Britain as a patron
May 15 – A military coup occurs in Bolivia.
May 23 – The Tibetan government signs the Seventeen Point Agreement for the Peaceful Liberation of Tibet, with the People's Republic of China.
May 25 – The first atomic bomb "boosted" by the inclusion of thermonuclear materials, is tested in the "Item" test on Enewetok Atoll in the Marshall Islands by the United States.
June 14 – UNIVAC I is dedicated by the U.S. Census Bureau.[3]
June 15–July 1– In New Mexico, Arizona, California, Oregon, Washington and British Columbia, thousands of acres of forests are destroyed in fires.

It is into this world, that you will march, ever forward, until you sleep "the big sleep, not caring about the nastiness of how you died or where you fell." - Raymond Chandler - *The Big Sleep*

----

**Resources**

DAO wiki 
with links to all DAO and TAC games and summaries of plots for those who don't have time to read the whole game.
http://www.scarlettfiles.com

These can be helpful coloring your language with the words of the time.
50's slang:
https://bestlifeonline.com/1950s-slang-terms/
https://fiftiesweb.com/pop/1950s-slang/

Noire slang: https://www.miskatonic.org/slang.html
story:
Name: The Ciphered Note

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the reader to the discovery of the thin folder and the encrypted note within. The protagonist, a former TAC operative, will come across the file during the clean-up of a metaphysical disaster at Los Alamos campus. Intrigued by the mysterious content of the note, the protagonist will embark on a quest to decipher its message and uncover the truth behind the missing item mentioned in the note.









The protagonist's encounters with the underground occult practitioners and artifact collectors led them to a series of trials and tests, each more perilous than the last. The network of practitioners, known as the "Cabal of Shadows," had long been the guardians of the magical decoder artifact, using their dark powers to protect it from falling into the wrong hands. As the protagonist sought to acquire the artifact, they found themselves entangled in a web of ancient rituals and forbidden knowledge, each step bringing them closer to the heart of the Cabal's power. However, the Cabal was not the only faction seeking the artifact. Rival sorcerers, each with their own motives and agendas, emerged from the shadows, setting the stage for a confrontation that would test the protagonist's skills and determination to the limit. The protagonist's journey to acquire the artifact was fraught with peril, testing their resolve and resourcefulness at every turn. Along the way, they uncovered long-buried secrets and hidden agendas, forcing them to question who they could trust and what sacrifices they were willing to make in their pursuit of the truth. Despite the mounting challenges, the protagonist remained determined to unravel the secrets of the encrypted note and uncover the truth behind the missing item, knowing that the fate of not only themselves but also the world hung in the balance.

The protagonist's pursuit of the magical decoder artifact brought them face to face with the enigmatic prophecy that had been shrouded in mystery for centuries. As they delved deeper into the ancient texts and scrolls, they uncovered cryptic warnings of a new era of magic, foretelling both the promise of untold power and the looming threat of catastrophic consequences. The prophecy spoke of a chosen one who would possess the magical decoder artifact, wielding its power to either bring about a golden age of enlightenment or unleash untold destruction upon the world. The protagonist's quest took on a new urgency as they realized the weight of their responsibility in preventing the artifact from falling into the wrong hands. With each revelation, they were drawn further into a world of intrigue and danger, where every step brought them closer to unlocking the true potential of the artifact and determining the fate of the world itself. The ancient prophecy became both a guiding light and a haunting specter, driving the protagonist forward even as it filled them with a deep sense of foreboding. They knew that their journey was far from over, and the true test of their resolve was yet to come.

The protagonist's arrival in the remote village brought them face to face with the daunting task of proving themselves worthy to Master Jiang, the enigmatic figure who held the key to unlocking the artifact's true potential. The village was shrouded in mystery, and the inhabitants regarded the protagonist with a mixture of curiosity and suspicion. As they navigated the intricate web of customs and traditions, they began to unravel the secrets of the village and its connection to the ancient prophecy. The protagonist's determination was unwavering, fueled by the knowledge that the fate of the world hung in the balance. Their encounter with Master Jiang would be the turning point in their quest, and they were prepared to face whatever challenges lay ahead.

The protagonist's encounters with the underground occult practitioners and artifact collectors led them to a series of trials and tests, each more perilous than the last. The network of practitioners, known as the "Cabal of Shadows," had long been the guardians of the magical decoder artifact, using their dark powers to protect it from falling into the wrong hands. As the protagonist sought to acquire the artifact, they found themselves entangled in a web of ancient rituals and forbidden knowledge, each step bringing them closer to the heart of the Cabal's power. However, the Cabal was not the only faction seeking the artifact. Rival sorcerers, each with their own motives and agendas, emerged from the shadows, setting the stage for a confrontation that would test the protagonist's skills and determination to the limit.

The protagonist's bond with Master Jiang grew stronger as they delved into the depths of magical knowledge, and they began to understand the true significance of their quest. With each passing day, they honed their skills and expanded their understanding of the artifact's power, drawing closer to the moment when they would be ready to confront the forces that sought to misuse it. The village, once cloaked in suspicion, now embraced the protagonist as a chosen protector, and they found allies among its inhabitants who were willing to aid them in their mission. The protagonist's journey had only just begun, but they were now equipped with the knowledge and abilities needed to face the challenges that lay ahead. As they continued their training, the protagonist discovered an ancient prophecy that foretold the rise of a dark sorcerer who sought to harness the power of the magical decoder artifact for their own nefarious purposes. This revelation added a new layer of urgency to their quest, as they realized that time was running out to prevent the prophecy from coming to pass. With the support of Master Jiang and their newfound allies, the protagonist set out to uncover the truth behind the dark sorcerer's plans and thwart their attempts to seize the artifact. The journey ahead would test not only their magical abilities but also their resolve and determination to protect the world from the impending threat.

The protagonist and their allies embarked on a treacherous journey through the mountainous terrain, facing numerous challenges and tests along the way. As they navigated the perilous path, they encountered natural obstacles such as steep cliffs, raging rivers, and unpredictable weather conditions. However, the true trials came in the form of magical barriers and illusions that guarded the long-forgotten chamber. premise:
New Altstadt is built on layers upon layers of ruins, glass skyscrapers laying siege to the stone buildings of the old town. Globalisation has made it so that everyone from anywhere has the same chance to be hacked, conned, and mugged in cyberspace and in the streets.

Security is in the hands of private military and security companies, the government  is run by corporations, robots have taken over most of the jobs, and everything is as it should be. You have time on your hands, a knack for causing trouble, and a score to settle. Any score. 

On the outside, New Altstadt is an ideal city: safe, picturesque, technological and multicultural. But wander down the wrong alley, download the wrong file, and something hides there. Danger is not only in the hands of some zapped out wirehead, but on those you least expect it from, in ways you could have never imagined. 

In the New Altstadt, you can be a hacktivist, an environmental terrorist, a con artist, anyone in favour or against technolgy being integrated into every aspect of our lives, including our bodies.

premise: Crashed on a mysterious island beneath a sky of unfamiliar stars, a group of survivors explore to survive. story:
Name: Starlit Isle

Outline: The novel begins with a group of survivors from a plane crash, stranded on a mysterious island beneath a sky of unfamiliar stars. The survivors are disoriented and unsure of their location, but they know they must explore the island in order to survive. As they venture into the unknown, they encounter strange flora and fauna, as well as signs of previous human activity. They must work together to overcome the threats of the island and find a way to escape.







The survivors cautiously approached the indigenous people, who regarded them with a mixture of wariness and curiosity. premise: This city kills everyone who touches it, sooner or later. Better to burn bright and flare out than fade into nothing. Cut quick, dive into the global information matrix, and don't trust anyone in this bleak future of cybernetic samurai and corporate intrigue. This deck features antiheroes ready to rock a world of dwindling privacy and fleeting fame where info's precious and life is cheap.
story:

The city is known for its deadly touch, as anyone who comes into contact with it eventually meets their demise. The protagonist, a cybernetic samurai named Kaito, is a skilled hacker and mercenary who navigates the city's dangerous landscape of corporate intrigue and dwindling privacy. Kaito is on a mission to uncover the truth behind the city's deadly nature and the powerful forces that control it.







As the duel begins, Kaito and Phantom navigate through the ever-changing virtual landscape, each trying to outmaneuver the other while facing unexpected obstacles and traps. The relentless pursuit of a security program, intent on their elimination, forces them to evade traps and obstacles at every turn. As they struggle to find a way out, they uncover shocking truths about the city's deadly secret, deepening the mystery and setting the stage for the next chapter of their perilous journey. The neon structures cast an eerie glow as they race through the ever-changing terrain, their cybernetic enhancements pushed to their limits. The tension between the two hackers is palpable, the air crackling with the energy of their rivalry. Just as they thought they had gained the upper hand, a new and unforeseen threat emerges, throwing their escape into chaos and setting the stage for an even more perilous turn of events.

premise:
It is the dawn of civilization.

A neolithic revolution is allowing humans to cease their nomadic wanderings. Permanent settlements are springing up in fertile river valleys around the world, places that will someday be known as Mesopotamia, Egypt, China, and India.

Plants and animals have been domesticated, bending to the will of those with the patience and understanding to change the course of evolution. Simple tribal roles and traditions have grown into complex institutions of government and religion. Advanced technology has afforded the luxury of specialization, advancing everything from art to architecture to record keeping.

It is a time of adventure and opportunity, where humanity has awakened to understand its true potential.

But, it is also a time of great peril.

The world remains a wild, unforgiving place, fraught with danger. The horrors of famine, disease, wild animals, and natural disasters threaten to snuff out civilization’s flickering light, as does the cruelty, greed, and ambitions of the newly civilized humans themselves.

It is your world.

It is your story.

Make it epic.

**Based on Michael Chambers & Holly Fain’s “World Analysis and Communications” class at Manor New Technology High School**
story:
Name: Dawn of Civilization

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the readers to a small neolithic settlement in a fertile river valley. The people are working the land, tending to their crops and domesticated animals. They are in awe of the advancements they have made, but also wary of the dangers that still lurk in the wild. The chapter will also introduce the main characters, a young couple who are eager to make a life for themselves in this new world.







The settlers' preparations are put to the test when a ferocious wild animal threatens the safety of the settlement. Adam and Eve, along with the other settlers, must quickly come up with a plan to defend themselves and ensure the survival of their community. The encounter with the wild animal will serve as a pivotal moment, highlighting the resilience and unity of the settlers as they face the harsh realities of their new world. As the sun began to dip below the horizon, the settlers gathered around the central fire, sharing stories and laughter to lift their spirits. But their peace was shattered by a blood-curdling roar that echoed through the valley, sending chills down their spines. The settlers sprang into action, grabbing whatever tools and weapons they could find to defend themselves. Adam and Eve took charge, rallying the others to form a defensive line and stand their ground against the approaching threat. The tension in the air was palpable as the settlers waited for the wild animal to emerge from the shadows, their hearts pounding in anticipation of the impending confrontation. 

Adam and Eve set out on their expedition, armed with spears and provisions for the journey. The wilderness was both beautiful and treacherous, with towering trees and lush foliage concealing potential threats. As they ventured deeper into the unknown, they encountered a series of strange rock formations that seemed to form a pattern. Intrigued, they followed the trail, eventually stumbling upon an ancient cave hidden within the dense forest. The cave was adorned with mysterious symbols and carvings, hinting at a civilization that had long been forgotten. As they delved deeper into the cavern, they uncovered relics and artifacts that spoke of a rich history waiting to be unearthed. But their discovery was cut short by a distant rumbling, signaling an imminent danger that threatened to consume them. With their hearts pounding, Adam and Eve realized that they had stumbled upon something far greater and more perilous than they could have ever imagined.

The settlers' expedition into the wilderness was filled with both trepidation and excitement as they ventured deeper into the unknown. The ancient ruins they encountered were a testament to a civilization that had long been forgotten, and the settlers couldn't help but feel a sense of awe and reverence for the people who had once inhabited the land. As they continued their journey, they discovered strange symbols etched into the rocks and mysterious artifacts that hinted at a complex and enigmatic culture. The settlers were driven by an insatiable curiosity to unravel the secrets of the past, but they soon realized that their quest for knowledge would come at a price. The wilderness was unforgiving, and they found themselves facing not only the dangers of the natural world but also something far more sinister lurking in the shadows. Tensions ran high as the settlers grappled with the realization that the secrets of the past may be more dangerous than they had anticipated, setting the stage for the next phase of their journey.

The settlers welcomed the mysterious figure into their group, grateful for the specialized knowledge and experience they brought to the expedition. As they journeyed deeper into the wilderness, the tracker, known only as Ash, shared stories of the land's history and the dangers that lay ahead. Despite the settlers' initial wariness, they soon found themselves entranced by Ash's captivating tales and vast knowledge of the wilderness. However, as they neared the heart of the ancient ruins, they began to sense an ominous presence lurking in the shadows, and tensions within the group grew. The settlers were torn between their desire to uncover the secrets of the past and the growing unease that had settled over them. As they delved further into the unknown, the true nature of the enigmatic symbols and artifacts began to reveal itself, and the settlers found themselves facing a threat far more sinister than they could have ever imagined.



The settlers' footsteps echoed through the ancient ruins, the weight of the oppressive atmosphere bearing down on them like an invisible shroud. Each step forward felt like a battle against the suffocating malevolence that seemed to seep from the very stones around them. Ash, their enigmatic guide, remained a stoic presence at the head of the group, his eyes constantly scanning their surroundings for any sign of danger. The settlers found themselves clinging to his every word, seeking reassurance in his unwavering determination. But even Ash's demeanor couldn't dispel the palpable sense of dread that hung in the air. As they ventured further, the ancient symbols etched into the walls seemed to pulse with an otherworldly energy, casting eerie shadows that danced in the flickering torchlight. The artifacts they encountered whispered of a forgotten past, their enigmatic forms hinting at a power far beyond their understanding. The settlers' unease grew with each passing moment, their nerves fraying as they struggled to maintain a facade of composure. Every decision they made felt like a weighty gamble, the consequences unknown and potentially dire. The expedition had become a crucible, testing not only their physical endurance but also the strength of their bonds and the resilience of their spirits. Each member of the group felt the weight of responsibility pressing down on them, knowing that the choices they made in the coming moments would shape the course of their fate.

premise: Join a rag-tag bunch of 'adventurers' just trying to survive the retribution of angry Druids and navigate the perilous waters of some gods that may be taking a little TOO much interest in their lives.
story:
Name: The Druid's Retribution

Outline:

The ancient forest loomed around them, its thick canopy blocking out the sunlight and casting everything in a dim, greenish light. The group of adventurers moved cautiously, their eyes constantly scanning the surrounding trees for any sign of danger. They had been on the run for days, ever since the Druids had begun their relentless pursuit. The accusations against them were false, but the Druids seemed to care little for the truth.

As they trudged through the underbrush, the adventurers couldn't shake the feeling that they were being watched. Strange things had been happening to them since they had entered the forest – their supplies had gone missing, their path seemed to shift when they weren't looking, and they had even caught glimpses of shadowy figures flitting between the trees. It was as if the very forest itself was working against them.

The group finally emerged into a small clearing, and as they caught their breath, they couldn't help but feel that they were being toyed with by forces beyond their understanding. They had heard whispers of gods taking an interest in mortal affairs, but they had never taken such stories seriously. Now, however, they couldn't deny the feeling that they were pawns in a game they didn't even know they were playing.

Elder Willow's words hung heavy in the air as the adventurers weighed their options. They knew they were in a dangerous situation, and the promise of guidance and the truth about the Druids was tempting. But they couldn't ignore the feeling that there was more to Elder Willow's story than met the eye. As they deliberated, the forest seemed to grow darker around them, the shadows closing in as if to swallow them whole. Time seemed to slow to a crawl, and the adventurers felt the weight of their decision pressing down on them. Finally, with a sense of grim determination, they turned to Elder Willow and agreed to follow, knowing that they were stepping into the unknown.

The adventurers stood at the center of the sanctuary, their hearts heavy with the weight of the prophecy that Elder Willow had revealed to them. The otherworldly beings watched them with inscrutable gazes, their luminous forms casting an otherworldly glow. As the adventurers grappled with the enormity of their decision, they couldn't shake the feeling that the fate of the world hung in the balance. Elder Willow's words echoed in their minds, a haunting reminder of the responsibility that now rested on their shoulders. They knew that whatever choice they made would have far-reaching consequences, not only for themselves but for the entire world. The sanctuary seemed to pulse with ancient power, and the air crackled with an energy that was both exhilarating and terrifying. Tensions rose as the adventurers struggled to come to terms with the gravity of their situation, knowing that their decision would shape the course of history. They exchanged wary glances, unsure of what lay ahead, but determined to face whatever trials awaited them.

The mysterious figure stepped forward from the shadows of the sanctuary, their presence shrouded in an aura of enigma and power. The adventurers watched with a mixture of wariness and curiosity as the figure offered to guide and aid them in their quest. Their words were laced with promises of unlocking the secrets of the ancient forest, but the true intentions behind their offer remained as inscrutable as the otherworldly beings that surrounded them. As tensions rose and the stakes grew even higher, the adventurers found themselves torn between trusting this enigmatic figure or venturing into the unknown on their own. The weight of the prophecy still hung heavy in the air, and the decision they were about to make would shape the course of history. Elder Willow's words echoed in their minds, a haunting reminder of the responsibility that rested on their shoulders. The sanctuary seemed to pulse with ancient power, and the air crackled with an energy that was both exhilarating and terrifying. The adventurers exchanged wary glances, unsure of what lay ahead, but determined to face whatever trials awaited them.

The rift opens, and the adventurers are faced with a choice: whether to venture into the unknown realm or stay and confront the otherworldly beings and the mysterious figure. Their decision will have far-reaching consequences, and they must weigh their options carefully. As they stand at the precipice of this new discovery, the stakes are higher than ever, and the fate of the world hangs in the balance. The mysterious figure's words linger in the air, promising to guide and aid them in unlocking the secrets of the ancient forest. But the adventurers can't shake the feeling that there's more to this enigmatic character than meets the eye. Tensions rise as they grapple with the weight of Elder Willow's prophecy, and the sanctuary pulses with an ancient power that seems to both draw them in and warn them to proceed with caution. The decision they're about to make will shape the course of history, and the responsibility weighs heavily on their shoulders. Each adventurer struggles with conflicting emotions, torn between trust and skepticism, curiosity and fear. The sanctuary crackles with an energy that's both exhilarating and terrifying, and the air seems to hum with the weight of their decision.

The adventurers took their first tentative steps into the mysterious realm, their senses immediately overwhelmed by the unfamiliar sights and sounds that surrounded them. The air crackled with an energy that was both exhilarating and terrifying, and they could feel the weight of the prophecy looming over them, reminding them of the impending doom that threatened the world. As they ventured deeper into the unknown, they quickly realized that the challenges they faced were not just physical, but also deeply rooted in their innermost fears and desires. Each of them was forced to confront the darkest corners of their hearts, testing their resolve and pushing them to the brink of their abilities. The sanctuary seemed to pulse with an ancient power, urging them to push forward, while simultaneously warning them to proceed with caution. The enigmatic figure's promises echoed in their minds, tempting them with the allure of unlocking the secrets of the ancient forest. Doubts gnawed at the edges of their resolve, and they exchanged wary glances, unsure of what lay ahead, but determined to face whatever trials awaited them in the mysterious realm.

The adventurers, grappling with the weight of their decision, are suddenly confronted with a series of trials that test their loyalty, courage, and moral compass. The enigmatic figure reappears, offering guidance but also sowing seeds of doubt, as they navigate the treacherous path ahead. The weight of their decision will shape not only their destinies but also the fate of the mysterious realm they have ventured into. premise:
It is 2075, and you are the next great hope for Humanity.

The *Hephaestus* is an interstellar ship, the first of its kind, with a course charted for a system hundreds of light-years away.  You are one of hundreds onboard, stowed safely in cryogenic stasis as your vessel makes its way to the new and unknown.

Your destination? A new planet, showing every chance of supporting life -- a chance for Humanity to start again.

And your payload? A stargate, one of the most advanced pieces of Human technology, through which Humanity will take its first true steps into the greater galaxy.

Earth is fading, despite Humanity's best efforts, and so they have placed their trust in the team onboard the *Hephaestus*, and in you, and in the work they've entrusted you with accomplishing...four hundred years from now.

It was 2075, and that's the last thing you remember.

You are the last great hope for Humanity.
story:
Name: The Last Hope

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the main character, who wakes up from cryogenic stasis on the *Hephaestus* and learns about the mission to find a new planet for Humanity. The character will struggle to come to terms with the reality of being the last hope for Humanity and the weight of the responsibility placed on their shoulders. They will also begin to uncover the challenges and obstacles that lie ahead on their journey.







The crew members set out to explore the new planet, their senses heightened by the anticipation of what they might discover. They encountered strange and wondrous creatures, some of which seemed to be intelligent and communicated with them in ways they couldn't understand. As they ventured further, they stumbled upon ancient ruins that hinted at a civilization that had once thrived there. The landscape was both beautiful and treacherous, with towering mountains, vast oceans, and dense forests that posed challenges as well as opportunities for exploration. The crew's search for the missing member led them to uncover unsettling truths about the planet's hidden dangers and the mysterious creatures that inhabit it. Frantically, they searched every corner of the unfamiliar terrain, calling out the missing crew member's name in desperation. The lush forests and rocky terrain seemed to conceal the crew member's whereabouts, adding to the sense of urgency and dread. Questions arose about the true nature of the planet, and the crew's unity was put to the test as they grappled with the unknown. The atmosphere of camaraderie and wonder was replaced by a cloud of uncertainty and mistrust, as they realized that the planet held secrets far more sinister than they had initially imagined. The missing crew member became a symbol of the dangers lurking in the shadows, prompting the crew to confront the harsh reality of their situation. The search for their lost comrade became a metaphor for their struggle to survive in this enigmatic and perilous world, where every step could lead to either salvation or doom.

The crew's discovery of the ancient artifacts not only fuels their determination to find their missing comrade but also deepens their resolve to unveil the secrets of the enigmatic world. As they delve into the secrets held within the artifacts, they begin to understand the true nature of the planet and the dangers that await them. This discovery sets the stage for their next phase of exploration and survival in this perilous world. The artifacts reveal a history of conflict and destruction, shedding light on the malevolent forces at play on the planet. The crew must navigate a delicate balance between unraveling the mysteries of the planet and ensuring their own safety. premise:
Nova - the term for a new so-called evolution of humanity. The first documented Nova was 5 years ago, when a young woman miraculously survived an apartment fire. Her newfound Nova power allowed her to control the fire itself.

Soon after, young Novas started appearing all over the globe. No one was sure why they suddenly developed powers.

Seeing a need to be filled, the Galvan Corporation began the construction of an academy, to teach and train new Novas how to use their powers in a safe location.

Located in Colorado near the Rocky Mountains, the Galvan Academy now accepts students with Nova powers for high-class private education for both their minds and their powers.

---

#Additional Info

Please see this google document for known facts about the Galvan Academy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EfigfccIb5vQ-P4U1OCajJqVbIE8rhEbJ4YbnrHHH44/edit?usp=sharing

Galvan Academy is a high school for teenagers with Nova powers (like super powers or mutant powers). You are students at this academy. I'm aiming for a mix of drama and humor.

The first scene will be your collective arrival in Colorado, waiting for your bus to the school.

##On Character Creation
Your characters are incoming members of the Sophomore-level class (this school is only for grades 10-12, as most Novas do not show signs of their powers until they are nearly 15). You can be from anywhere in the world, though since the Galvan Academy is in the United States, speaking English is required and most applicants are from North America.

**Why is my character going to school there?**
Likely because you recently acquired Nova powers, and they are... disruptive to your life. Maybe your parents can't handle them, or your community distrusts you. Either way, somehow you applied, and were granted a scholarship or your family paid your way to this prestigious school that specializes in helping Nova.

**Nova power?**
Nova powers are still relatively new; not much is known about Novas. In fact, the Galvan Coporation is on the forefront of understanding the Nova phenomenon, though much of what they know is still secret.

Nova powers are dormant until the person reaches puberty, at which point the power reveals itself, usually during a stressful moment in time.

**What should I include in my character description?**
Please include how your character's Nova powers manifested, as well as a detailed description of your character's powers. No one should have anywhere near complete mastery of their powers at this point (that's what special Nova school is for, after all).

Feel free to make up any new cards as you feel, *especially for your powers*.

---

This is my first time narrating, so if you have any suggestions please let me know. This is based off of an RP I participated in on Gaia long, long ago. :)
story:
Name: The Nova Academy

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the main characters as they arrive in Colorado and wait for the bus to take them to the Galvan Academy. Each character will have a unique reason for attending the academy and will have recently discovered their Nova powers. The chapter will also provide background information on the Nova phenomenon and the Galvan Corporation's role in understanding and training Novas.







The students' reactions were a mix of awe, wonder, and excitement as they toured the campus and realized the magnitude of the opportunities that lay before them at the Galvan Academy. Maya and Alex exchanged excited glances as they marveled at the state-of-the-art facilities and the specialized classes designed to help them understand and harness their newfound abilities. Other students were buzzing with anticipation, eager to explore the advanced training rooms and cutting-edge laboratories that promised to unlock the full potential of their Nova powers. The faculty members leading the tour were met with a barrage of questions as the students' curiosity and enthusiasm reached new heights. It was clear that the Galvan Academy was not just a school, but a place of hope, growth, and endless possibilities for these young Novas.

Maya, Alex, and their fellow students settle into their new routine at the Galvan Academy, eager to explore the advanced training rooms and cutting-edge laboratories that promise to unlock the full potential of their Nova powers. As they delve into their studies, they stumble upon a hidden chamber within the academy that holds ancient artifacts related to the origins of Nova powers. This discovery piques their curiosity and sets the stage for a deeper exploration of the Galvan Corporation's involvement in the emergence of Nova powers. As they uncover a web of secrets, they realize that the true nature of their powers and the organization behind the academy may not be what it seems.

Maya, Alex, and their fellow students began to dig deeper into the mystery surrounding the hidden chamber and the ancient artifacts they discovered within the Galvan Academy. As they delved into the history of Nova powers, they stumbled upon a rival group of Novas who had a different agenda. This encounter tested their newfound abilities and friendships, as they navigated the complex web of alliances and rivalries within the Nova community. Tensions rose as Maya and Alex had to decide where their loyalties lie and how far they were willing to go to uncover the truth about their powers and the Galvan Corporation's true intentions. The rival group's intentions remained shrouded in mystery, adding to the uncertainty and danger that loomed over the once-promising future at the Galvan Academy.

Maya and Alex, driven by their insatiable curiosity, embarked on a quest to unravel the connection between the rival group's mysterious agenda and the ancient artifacts. They spent countless hours poring over the artifacts, analyzing every detail in search of clues that would lead them to the truth. As they delved deeper into the history of Nova powers, Maya and Alex made startling discoveries that shook the foundation of everything they thought they knew. Their journey led them to unexpected challenges and dangers, testing the limits of their abilities and their resolve. Along the way, they uncovered a deeper conspiracy involving the origins of Nova powers and the Galvan Corporation's role in it, a truth that could change everything.

Maya and Alex, fueled by their determination to uncover the truth, deciphered the hidden message within the ancient artifact, revealing coordinates to a remote location shrouded in mystery. As they set out on this new journey, their hearts raced with anticipation and trepidation, knowing that they were delving deeper into the heart of the conspiracy surrounding the Galvan Corporation and the origins of Nova powers. The journey to the remote location was fraught with challenges and obstacles, testing their courage and resolve at every turn. Along the way, they encountered strange phenomena that defied the laws of nature, hinting at the immense power and ancient forces at play. As they finally arrived at the remote location, they were met with a breathtaking sight - an ancient temple hidden within the depths of the wilderness, emanating an otherworldly energy that sent shivers down their spines. The secrets they were about to uncover within the temple would not only shed light on the true origins of Nova powers but also bring them closer to the heart of the conspiracy surrounding the Galvan Corporation.

As Maya and Alex ventured deeper into the ancient temple, the air grew heavy with the weight of history, and the intricate carvings on the walls seemed to whisper long-forgotten secrets. Each chamber they entered held cryptic symbols and enigmatic murals, hinting at a story of a bygone era. The urgency gnawed at them, as if time itself was pressing down on their shoulders, propelling them forward in their quest. In one of the chambers, they uncovered a set of ancient scrolls that spoke of prophecies foretelling a looming threat to the balance of power within the Nova community. The weight of responsibility settled heavily upon them, as they realized that they were the key to unraveling the prophecies and uncovering the identity of the enigmatic figure. Their journey had taken an unexpected turn, thrusting them into a race against time and danger to decipher the prophecies and thwart the impending threat that loomed over the Nova community.



As Maya and Alex delved deeper into the ancient temple, they were met with a series of trials and challenges, each designed to test their abilities and courage. The first trial they encountered was a labyrinthine maze filled with illusions and traps, designed to disorient and confuse them. Despite the overwhelming odds, Maya and Alex relied on their wits and teamwork to navigate the treacherous maze, emerging victorious and more determined than ever. The second trial took them to the heart of a raging storm, where they had to harness their Nova powers to calm the tempest and find their way through the chaos. The third trial led them into a realm of shifting shadows and mirrors, where they were forced to confront their deepest fears and doubts. Each trial pushed them to the limits of their abilities, revealing new facets of their powers and unlocking hidden potential within them. As they emerged from the final trial, they found themselves standing before an ancient altar, where the enigmatic figure awaited them with a cryptic message that would change everything.

The enigmatic figure presents Maya and Alex with a choice that will determine the fate of the Nova community, setting them on a path fraught with peril and uncertainty. As they grapple with the weight of this decision, they begin to uncover clues that hint at the true nature of the figure and the hidden agenda that lies beneath the surface. Maya and Alex are torn between the responsibility that comes with their powers and the desire to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic figure's cryptic message. The weight of their choice hangs heavy in the air as they prepare to embark on a journey that will shape the destiny of the Nova community.

Maya and Alex, driven by a sense of duty and curiosity, decide to delve deeper into the mysteries of the ancient temple. As they explore, they encounter obstacles and puzzles that test their resolve and ingenuity. As they delve further into the temple's depths, they encounter strange phenomena that defy all logical explanation, testing the limits of their newfound powers and their courage.

premise: The deep-space starship *Dauntless* and its crew embark on a new mission of exploration and diplomacy beyond the boundaries of the Human Colonies. Adventure and mystery lie ahead.

Name: Beyond the Horizon

Outline:

As the *Dauntless* prepares to depart from the Human Colonies, Captain Elena Ramirez stands on the bridge, overseeing the final preparations. She is a seasoned and respected leader, known for her calm demeanor and unwavering determination. Her first officer, Commander Marcus Chen, stands by her side, his sharp mind and strategic thinking complementing the captain's leadership. The crew buzzes with anticipation, eager to venture into the unknown and make history.

The crew of the *Dauntless* represents the best of humanity, coming from different backgrounds and cultures, united in their mission to explore and establish peaceful relations with any extraterrestrial civilizations they may encounter. Among them is Dr. Aisha Khan, a brilliant xenobiologist who is eager to study new forms of life beyond the Human Colonies. Lieutenant Michael O'Connor, a skilled diplomat, is tasked with representing the interests of the Human Colonies and forging alliances with any alien species they may encounter.

As the *Dauntless* sets off into the depths of space, the crew braces themselves for the challenges and mysteries that lie ahead. Their mission is not without risk, as they are venturing into uncharted territory where anything could happen. But they are driven by the spirit of discovery and the hope of forging new connections that will shape the future of humanity and the galaxy.

The *Dauntless* glides through the vast expanse of space, its sleek exterior shimmering under the glow of distant stars. Captain Ramirez stands on the bridge, her eyes fixed on the viewscreen as the ship hurtles forward into the unknown. The crew members move about with purpose, their training and expertise evident in their every action. Commander Chen's fingers dance across the control panel, orchestrating the ship's trajectory with precision. As they venture further from the Human Colonies, a sense of anticipation and apprehension fills the air, mingling with the hum of the ship's engines. Dr. Khan busies herself in the research lab, her mind racing with the possibilities of what they might encounter. Lieutenant O'Connor reviews his diplomatic protocols, preparing for the delicate negotiations that may lie ahead. Each member of the crew is acutely aware of the weight of their mission, and the responsibility that rests upon their shoulders. The *Dauntless* is not just a ship; it is a beacon of hope, carrying the aspirations of an entire civilization into the uncharted reaches of space.

As Dr. Khan's expertise in xenobiology becomes crucial, the crew makes a startling discovery about the true nature of the alien species they have encountered. The crew's interactions with the alien species become increasingly tense, leading to a series of events that will test their resolve and unity as they navigate the uncharted territories of space. Dr. Khan's research reveals that the alien species has a complex social structure, with conflicting factions vying for dominance. Lieutenant O'Connor's diplomatic skills are put to the test as he attempts to navigate the intricate web of alliances and rivalries among the alien factions. The crew's unity is put to the test as they face the unknown dangers lurking within the alien outpost, and they must rely on each other's strengths to navigate the treacherous terrain and outmaneuver the alien factions that seek to thwart their mission. In May of 1939, somewhere in the jungles of 
Africa, a small band of soldiers have stumbled

story:
Name: The Lost Temple of Kafirah

Outline: In the first chapter, the novel introduces a small band of soldiers in the jungles of Africa in May of 1939. They have stumbled across something ancient and terrible, and are about to suffer the consequences.







The soldiers continued to press deeper into the darkness, their lanterns casting long, flickering shadows on the ancient walls. Suddenly, they stumbled upon a hidden chamber, its entrance obscured by centuries of neglect. As they cautiously entered, they were met with a sight that sent shivers down their spines. The chamber was adorned with intricate carvings and strange symbols, and at its center lay a sarcophagus, covered in dust and cobwebs. Captain Jack Reynolds approached the sarcophagus, his heart pounding with anticipation and dread. As he reached out to touch it, a sudden rumbling filled the chamber, and the walls began to shake violently. The soldiers scrambled for cover as the ground beneath them gave way, plunging them into darkness.

The soldiers cautiously approached the stone tablet, its inscriptions glowing in the torchlight. The ancient prophecy warned of a looming danger that posed a threat to the world, and the soldiers realized that they were now embarking on a perilous quest to unravel the mysteries of the ancient temple and confront the impending peril. As they pored over the cryptic symbols, a sense of urgency gripped them, and they knew that time was of the essence. They vowed to decipher the prophecy and prevent the impending catastrophe, no matter the cost. With their resolve steeled, they ventured deeper into the heart of the temple, determined to uncover the truth and save the world from destruction.

The soldiers set out on a perilous journey through the treacherous jungle, facing various obstacles and adversaries along the way, as they seek the mystical artifact that could save the world from the impending catastrophe. Their quest takes them to remote and dangerous locations, testing their courage and resilience to the very limits. The dense jungle loomed around the small band of soldiers, the air heavy with humidity and the sounds of unseen creatures. Captain Jack Reynolds wiped the sweat from his brow as he led his men deeper into the unknown territory. They had been sent on a mission to investigate reports of an ancient temple hidden deep within the jungle, rumored to hold great treasures and secrets. But as they trudged through the thick underbrush, a sense of unease settled over the group. Suddenly, the soldiers stumbled upon a clearing, and there, rising from the earth like a specter from the past, was the ancient temple they had been searching for. The structure was overgrown with vines and moss, its stone walls weathered and worn by centuries of neglect. But their curiosity and determination drove them forward, and they were soon met with a chamber unlike any they had ever seen. The walls were adorned with vivid murals depicting scenes of great upheaval and cataclysmic events. At the center of the chamber, they discovered a worn map that hinted at the location of the mystical artifact that could avert the impending catastrophe. Captain Jack Reynolds recalled a legend about this artifact, said to hold the key to saving the world from the ancient prophecy's foretold danger. The soldiers knew that they had to set out immediately to find this artifact, for the fate of the world rested in their hands.

As the soldiers venture into the treacherous ravine, they are suddenly ambushed by a group of ruthless mercenaries who are also in pursuit of the mystical artifact. A fierce battle erupts, and the soldiers find themselves fighting for their lives, determined to protect the valuable knowledge they possess. The outcome of this intense confrontation will not only test their physical prowess but also lead to unexpected revelations about the true nature of their adversaries and the dangers that lie ahead. Amidst the chaos, one of the soldiers uncovers a hidden power within themselves, unlocking ancient abilities that could change the course of their quest. As the dust settles, they realize that their journey has become even more perilous, with new enemies and challenges emerging from the shadows.

The soldiers realize that their journey is far from over, and the stakes have never been higher as they prepare to embark on a perilous expedition to unravel the secrets of the ancient temples and prevent the impending catastrophe.

However, their resolve is tested when a mysterious figure claiming to possess extensive knowledge of the ancient temples steps out of the shadows to offer help. As they grapple with the decision of whether to trust this enigmatic figure, they find themselves drawn deeper into a web of intrigue and uncertainty.



The soldiers, now battle-weary and bloodied, regroup after the intense confrontation with the ruthless mercenaries. As they tend to their wounds and take stock of their dwindling supplies, they realize that the stakes of their expedition have been raised to unimaginable heights. The discovery of the hidden power within one of their own has left them both awed and apprehensive, as they grapple with the implications of this newfound ability. Whispers of ancient prophecies and long-forgotten legends fill the air, fueling their determination to press on despite the mounting dangers that surround them. The soldiers find themselves at a crossroads, unsure of how to harness this newfound power and integrate it into their quest. They are plagued by doubts and fears, wondering if this power will lead them to salvation or spell their ultimate downfall. The enigmatic figure's warnings and veiled threats now take on a new significance, as the soldiers begin to question the true nature of their mission and the forces that seek to thwart their every move. The ancient temple, once a mere backdrop to their expedition, now looms ominously over them, its secrets and perils more daunting than ever before. The soldiers grapple with the realization that they are not just in pursuit of a mystical artifact, but are entangled in a web of ancient powers and cosmic forces beyond their comprehension. As they prepare to venture deeper into the heart of the temple, they steel themselves for the challenges that lie ahead, knowing that their newfound abilities may be the key to unlocking the truth behind the impending catastrophe and the salvation of the world.

The soldiers, their hearts heavy with the weight of their newfound abilities, cautiously make their way deeper into the heart of the ancient temple. The air grows thick with an otherworldly energy, and the very walls seem to pulse with a life of their own. As they press on, they encounter a series of harrowing trials and tribulations, each more perilous than the last. The temple itself seems to be testing their resolve, as if it were a living entity with a will of its own. They face treacherous traps and cunning illusions, designed to prey on their deepest fears and weaknesses. Yet, with each challenge overcome, they feel the power within them growing stronger, as if the temple itself is bestowing upon them the means to unlock its secrets. Finally, they come face to face with a powerful guardian, an ancient being of immense power and wisdom. The confrontation with this guardian leads to a revelation about the true nature of the mystical artifact they seek, as well as the pivotal role it plays in the fate of the world. The soldiers are left reeling from the profound truths they have uncovered, realizing that they are but pawns in a cosmic game far beyond their understanding. With this newfound knowledge, they must now navigate the treacherous path ahead, knowing that the fate of the world rests on their shoulders.

premise: This city kills everyone who touches it, sooner or later. Better to burn bright and flare out than fade into nothing. Cut quick, dive into the global information matrix, and don't trust anyone in this bleak future of cybernetic samurai and corporate intrigue. This deck features antiheroes ready to rock a world of dwindling privacy and fleeting fame where info's precious and life is cheap.

Name: Neon Blades

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the city, a dystopian metropolis where the cybernetic samurai and corporate intrigue dominate. The protagonist, a skilled hacker and antihero, will be introduced as they navigate the city's dangerous underbelly. The chapter will set the stage for the protagonist's journey to uncover the truth behind the city's deadly nature and the secrets hidden within the global information matrix.







The protagonist's encounter with the mysterious informant led them on a perilous journey through the city's most dangerous districts, where they uncovered a network of rebels and dissidents fighting against the oppressive regime. The informant's cryptic warnings and the protagonist's growing entanglement in the web of conspiracy and danger raised the stakes as they got closer to the truth. The danger grew more palpable, and the protagonist realized they were playing a deadly game with forces far beyond their control. As they navigated the labyrinthine alleys and shadowy corners of the city, the protagonist's cybernetic implants hummed softly, their enhanced vision picking up on the subtle signs of unrest and fear in the faces of the city's inhabitants. It became clear that the city's dark secret was intricately tied to the struggle for freedom and truth, and the protagonist found themselves entangled in a web of conspiracy and danger unlike anything they had ever faced before. The protagonist's cybernetic implants, a marvel of technology, were both a blessing and a curse as they delved deeper into the heart of the city's underworld. The enhanced abilities granted by the implants allowed them to navigate the treacherous terrain with ease, but it also made them a target for those who sought to keep the city's dark secret hidden. The protagonist's encounters with the rebels and dissidents opened their eyes to the harsh realities of life in the city, where the divide between the powerful and the powerless was stark and unforgiving. They witnessed firsthand the brutal crackdowns by the regime's enforcers, the ruthless tactics employed to maintain control and silence any dissent. The protagonist's determination to uncover the truth was unwavering, but they knew that they were treading on dangerous ground, risking not only their own life but also the lives of those who dared to stand against the oppressive regime. The city's dark secret loomed like a shadow over everything, and the protagonist was determined to shine a light on the truth, no matter the cost.

The protagonist, with the rebels and dissidents by their side, hatched a daring plan to confront the powerful corporation at the heart of the city. Using their cybernetic implants and hacking skills, they delved into the depths of the corporation's network, facing formidable security measures and intricate firewalls. The city's underbelly was a treacherous maze of data and deceit, but the protagonist's resolve remained unshaken. As they navigated through the virtual labyrinth, they uncovered shocking truths about the corporation's exploitation of the city's resources and its ruthless manipulation of the population. The stakes were higher than ever, and the protagonist knew that their actions could either ignite a revolution or seal their fate. With each keystroke, they risked not only their own life but also the lives of those who had placed their trust in the protagonist's quest for justice. The corporation's darkest secrets loomed before them, and the protagonist was ready to expose the truth, no matter the cost.

The day of reckoning had arrived, and the rebels and dissidents were ready to execute their daring plan. The city's underbelly buzzed with anticipation as they made their final preparations, each member bringing their unique skills and experiences to the table. The protagonist's determination and unwavering resolve inspired the group, and as they stood on the brink of revolution, the weight of responsibility sat heavily on their shoulders. Failure was not an option, and the group knew that the stakes were higher than ever. Tensions ran high as they geared up to take on the powerful forces that had held them captive for so long. The city held its breath, unaware of the impending upheaval that would shake its very foundations.

As the city erupts into turmoil, the rebels find themselves at the center of a dangerous and unpredictable struggle for freedom. The protagonist and their allies are prepared to risk it all as they stand united in their fight against the oppressive regime and the powerful corporation. Tensions run high as they gear up to take on the powerful forces that have held them captive for so long. The weight of responsibility sits heavily on their shoulders, but failure is not an option. The unexpected betrayal put the group's unity and resolve to the ultimate test, creating a new layer of tension and suspense as they strove to overcome this internal obstacle. As the rebels and dissidents executed their daring plan, a member of their group, who they trusted implicitly, turned out to be a double agent working for the oppressive regime. The shock and disbelief reverberated through the group, threatening to shatter the unity they had fought so hard to achieve. The protagonist's resolve was put to the test as they grappled with the betrayal, questioning their judgment and leadership. premise:
Sometime around 1200 years BC, Ulysses searched for a way home.  In the 9th century AD, Sinbad sailed the 7 seas.  In the 16th and 17th century, a scientific renaissance drove the gods and monsters from those ancient tales into legend.  However, the superstitious nature and traditions of sailors continued.

The Aberdeen was an ordinary merchant vessel, plying trade between Europe and the exotic lands of the Middle East.  But when the crew, made up of personnel from both destinations, was dropped into the middle of a war of truly mythical proportions, they began to face an adventure with all of the swashbuckling adventure of a pirate story combined with the epic fantasy of mankind’s most ancient legends.

The crew will soon have to learn how well the thin steel of a rapier can stand up on a battlefield of the gods.
story:
Name: The Steel of a Rapier

Outline: The crew of the Aberdeen, a merchant vessel traveling between Europe and the Middle East, finds themselves in the midst of a war of mythical proportions. As the crew, made up of people from both destinations, struggles to navigate the dangerous waters, they are suddenly thrust into an adventure that combines swashbuckling pirate stories with epic fantasy. They must learn to fight with the thin steel of a rapier on a battlefield of the gods.







The crew of the Aberdeen, now in possession of the powerful artifact, must navigate through the war-torn land, facing the challenges of the mythical battlefield. As they journey through the ruins of Constantinople, they encounter dangerous creatures and warring gods, all while trying to make the difficult decision of how to use the artifact without it falling into the wrong hands. The artifact becomes a focal point of their journey, and they must learn to fight with the thin steel of a rapier on a battlefield of the gods.

The crew of the Aberdeen, now in possession of the powerful artifact, must navigate through the war-torn land, facing the challenges of the mythical battlefield. The artifact becomes a focal point of their journey, and they must learn to fight with the thin steel of a rapier on a battlefield of the gods. The once peaceful and prosperous city of Constantinople was now a battleground for the ages, with gods and monsters clashing in a spectacle of destruction and chaos. The crew found themselves in the midst of this otherworldly war, their every step fraught with danger and uncertainty. The artifact they discovered seemed to hold the key to controlling the mythical creatures and gods, a power that could potentially turn the tide of the war. However, they soon realized that this power also brought with it a great responsibility, as the struggle for control and dominance in the war-torn land intensified. The crew had to grapple with the weight of this newfound power, knowing that their decision would have far-reaching consequences. As they continued their journey, they faced betrayal, alliances, and the harsh realities of war, all while carrying the burden of the artifact and its immense power. Each member of the crew was tested in ways they could never have imagined, and the lines between friend and foe became increasingly blurred as they fought to survive in this mythical battlefield.
