premise:
**Form Thread**: <https://storium.com/forums#/category/lfp/thread/mgk9z0>

**My Storium Philosophy**: <http://is.gd/v7DxCd>

Working at the Congregational Hospital in Kingsport, MA was never easy. It seemed like no one got out of that hospital unchanged — not one patient, not one doctor. Then everything went to hell one night. The crew on shift did their best to salvage the situation, but when the dead are hungry there isn't much to do. 

The hospital staff has escaped from ground zero and hunkered down on an island off of Marblehead, MA. Now they build up their defenses and try to figure out their next move. But what happens when new survivors start showing up on the island?

This game used the Medical Drama setting as a starting point but has branched out from there. At it's heart, **Alive** is a zombie (though we will all strive to not use that word) apocalypse game.

**Character Creation Notes**

Portraits are required. No picture, no entry. 

Treat the Backstory as a writing sample. I need to evaluate what kind of writer you are to get a feel for what your moves will be like.

Card Art is also required, it is intentionally not included. I'm evaluating what kinds of imagery you'll be using for Wild cards. 

**Gameplay Notes**

Tense (Past, Present, or Future) and Perspective (First or Third Person) can be move dependent. I'm not concerned with keeping a cohesive narrative, just an interesting one.

Speed is set to Normal (2-3 Scenes\week); the exception is I'm not active on weekends. I try to keep things at a steady pace, I will end scenes even if challenges aren't completed,  I will respond mid-scene to keep things moving, I will respond to challenges when they are completed, and I will wrap up scenes if everything has moved on in the narrative without everyone posting. I'm never going to wait on one or two at the expensive of the group. Players that go silent (No Moves, No Comments, No E-Mails) for a week will be written out of the game.

Communication is _very_ important to me. You don't have to move every day, but at least drop a note in the comments regularly so everyone knows what’s going on. I understand that Real Life happens, but if I don't know that you're going to be away I don't know how to plan for your character.

**Further Questions**

If you have any other questions feel free to e-mail me Alive@RobJustice.net
story:
Name: Alive

Outline: The novel begins with the chaos at Congregational Hospital in Kingsport, MA as the staff tries to deal with a sudden outbreak that turns the patients into flesh-eating monsters. The crew manages to escape and finds refuge on an island off of Marblehead, MA. They must now build up their defenses and figure out their next move as new survivors start showing up on the island.







The group holds a meeting to discuss the newcomer's news of a possible safe haven on the mainland. Tensions rise as suspicions grow, and trust in the newcomer is tested. Dr. Zhang grapples with maintaining order and unity within the group while navigating the decision-making process. The survivors share their fears and hopes, each voicing their opinions on whether to stay on the island or take their chances on the mainland. As the debate intensifies, personal stories are shared, shedding light on the survivors' pasts and the reasons behind their desire to stay or leave. Dr. Zhang listens intently, trying to find a compromise that will satisfy everyone, but the task proves to be more difficult than she anticipated. The newcomer tries to gain the group's trust by offering more details about the supposed safe haven, but some remain skeptical. The group is at a crossroads, and the decision they make will impact their chances of survival in the long run. 

The survivors are devastated to learn that the infected have somehow made their way to their supposed safe haven on the mainland, shattering their hopes of finding a secure refuge. Panic and confusion grip the group as they grapple with the harsh truth that nowhere is truly safe, and their chances of survival are dwindling. Dr. Zhang must once again step up to lead the group through this new crisis, but the weight of the responsibility threatens to crush her spirit. The group's unity will be put to the ultimate test as they navigate this unforeseen danger, and the decisions they make in the coming days will shape the course of their fate. The survivors are forced to confront the reality that they must rely on each other and work together if they are to have any chance of surviving in this new world. As they struggle to come to terms with this devastating setback, tensions rise, and trust is strained to its breaking point. The group's once serene island refuge now feels like a prison, trapping them in a web of fear and doubt.

The survivors are on edge as they grapple with the devastating news of the infected reaching their supposed safe haven on the mainland. Panic and confusion grip the group, and trust is at an all-time low. Dr. Zhang struggles to maintain order and unity within the group, but the weight of the responsibility threatens to crush her spirit. Tensions run high as the survivors try to navigate the emergence of new alliances and conflicts. The group must make difficult decisions that will shape the course of their fate. As they struggle to come to terms with this devastating setback, trust is strained to its breaking point, and the once serene island refuge now feels like a prison, trapping them in a web of fear and doubt.

Dr. Zhang, feeling the weight of leadership, gathers the survivors to address the fragility of their existence and the harsh reality of their situation. She makes a heartfelt plea for unity and trust, acknowledging the doubts and fears that have plagued the group. As tensions rise, she shares her own vulnerabilities and doubts, hoping to connect with the group on a deeper level. The survivors, touched by her sincerity, begin to open up about their own struggles and fears, fostering a newfound sense of camaraderie and understanding. Together, they vow to confront the challenges ahead with courage and resilience, knowing that their fate is intertwined. Dr. Zhang's emotional appeal rekindles hope and determination within the group, as they prepare to face the dangers of the new world with unwavering solidarity.

As the survivors delve into their pasts, they uncover unexpected connections and shared experiences that deepen their bonds and set the stage for the challenges that lie ahead. Each person's story reveals a resilience and strength that has brought them to this pivotal moment, solidifying their newfound sense of unity and purpose. Amidst the flashbacks, a new survivor emerges from the shadows, seeking refuge with the group. Their arrival brings a mix of hope and suspicion, as the survivors grapple with the decision of whether to trust this newcomer. Dr. Zhang, burdened by the weight of leadership, must navigate the delicate balance of integrating a new member while maintaining the group's unity. Tensions rise as the group faces the reality that their once serene island refuge now feels like a prison, trapping them in a web of fear and doubt. The emergence of this new ally forces the survivors to confront the fragility of their existence and the harsh reality that they are truly alone in this new, dangerous world. As they struggle to come to terms with this devastating setback, trust is strained to its breaking point, and the decisions they make in the coming days will shape the course of their fate.

The survivors are forced to confront the reality that they must rely on each other and work together if they are to have any chance of surviving in this new world. The emergence of this new ally forces the group to confront the fragility of their existence and the harsh reality that they are truly alone in this dangerous world. As they grapple with the decision of whether to trust this newcomer, tensions rise, and the delicate balance of integrating a new member while maintaining unity becomes increasingly challenging for Dr. Zhang. premise:
It was a cold November morning when, scrolling through creepy carpool offers and questionable used sofas, you found exactly the ad you had been looking for.


    Looking for Spooks (posted 3 days ago)

    Are you a Cryptid, Magic User, or otherwise Paranormal in nature??/? 
    Then we have something in common! 
    I am looking to put together a local group of cool friends, who can chat, about the problems we face as members of the SPOOKY community!!! 

    I hardly ever meet other non-humans in real life. 
    I figured when I moved to a big city, things would pick up! 
    That's where all the badass creatures hang out on TV. 
    But I guess we're rarer than I thought?? 
    Anyway. I would love to shoot the breeze with you, so e-mail me if you're interested, and live anywhere near crystal palace. 

    I won't post the location of the meeting here, cause you know some idiot human will think it's a JOKE! 
    Those guys are so silly!!

    * do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers


Your heart pounding in your chest, you type out a quick e-mail, and fire it off to *genuinespook69@gmail.com*. All you can do now is wait, and hope that this time it's real.
story:
Name: Spooky Connections

Outline: After stumbling upon an ad for a local group of paranormal beings, the protagonist eagerly sends an email in hopes of finally finding others like them. Frustrated with the lack of connection and understanding in the human world, they long for a sense of community and belonging. As they anxiously await a response, they can't help but wonder if this will finally be the opportunity they've been searching for.

The cold November morning seemed to match the chill that had settled in the protagonist's heart. They had spent years feeling isolated and misunderstood, unable to connect with the humans around them. But when they stumbled upon the ad for a group of paranormal beings seeking companionship, a spark of hope ignited within them. With shaking hands, they quickly sent off an email, their heart pounding with anticipation.

As they waited for a response, the protagonist couldn't shake the feeling of excitement and nervousness that consumed them. They had always felt like an outsider, never quite fitting in with the human world. But the prospect of finally finding others like them was both thrilling and terrifying. Would this be the community they had been searching for, or would it turn out to be just another disappointment?

Days passed, and the protagonist found themselves constantly checking their email, hoping for a response that never seemed to come. Doubt began to creep in, and they couldn't help but wonder if the ad had been nothing more than a cruel joke. But deep down, they refused to give up hope. They had come too far to let this opportunity slip through their fingers.

The protagonist's renewed sense of determination led them to delve deeper into the world of paranormal beings. They scoured the internet, looking for forums, chat rooms, and websites that catered to those who felt like outsiders in the human world. With each click and scroll, their hope grew, finding stories and experiences that mirrored their own. They reached out to others, sharing their own story and seeking connections. Slowly but surely, they began to form bonds with beings who understood their struggles and offered empathy and support. The sense of isolation that had plagued them for so long began to lift, replaced with a newfound sense of belonging and understanding. They spent hours chatting with their newfound friends, sharing laughter, tears, and everything in between. It was a far cry from the loneliness they had once felt, and they cherished every moment of it.

The protagonist's exploration of the hidden community of supernatural creatures living among humans led them to discover the complexities of maintaining secrecy and the challenges of building trust in this new world. The blurred lines between the human and paranormal realms presented unexpected obstacles, forcing the protagonist to confront their own beliefs and perceptions. Amidst this exploration, they encountered a powerful adversary who threatened to expose the entire community, leading to a gripping struggle for survival and acceptance.

The protagonist was torn between the desire to protect the community and the fear of exposing themselves to the dangerous adversary. They sought advice from their newfound friends, who offered varying perspectives and conflicting opinions. As the adversary's threats escalated, the protagonist was forced to make difficult choices that would have lasting consequences. The weight of responsibility and the fear of betrayal loomed over them, as they grappled with the intricacies of navigating the paranormal world. The sense of isolation that had once lifted was replaced with a new kind of burden, one that tested their loyalty and resilience. Amidst the chaos, the protagonist found unexpected allies, forming alliances that would shape the outcome of the impending conflict. The struggle for survival and acceptance took on a new urgency, pushing the protagonist to confront their own limitations and confront the true nature of their powers. The looming threat forced them to question their place within the community and the extent of their supernatural abilities.

The protagonist's exploration of the hidden sanctuary led them to discover ancient wisdom and powerful allies, shaping their understanding of the supernatural world and strengthening their resolve to confront the looming threat. As they delved deeper into the sanctuary's mysteries, they unearthed the history and traditions of the paranormal community, gaining insight into their own place within this intricate world. The sanctuary became a pivotal setting for their journey of self-discovery and resilience, fostering new alliances and challenges that would shape their role within the community. Amidst the ancient halls and mystical gardens, the protagonist found the courage to confront their own limitations and embrace the true nature of their powers, setting the stage for a new chapter in their journey.

premise:
"Keep the 15-20th free.  We are flying out to California to meet your grandpa at a family reunion," your mother said. Mom never says hello in phone calls, she just gets right to the point.  Even though you are used to it, this announcement give you pause.

"Mom, " you replied, "You told me you were an orphan."  

"I lied," Mom replied.  "So make sure you're free."  Then she hangs up the phone.

Thus begins your adventure where you meet your extended family, learn your extended family's dirty secrets, and witness your very first family murder! - I mean, reunion!

Some rules for character creation.

Mom  (aka Lisa Donner) appeared several years ago in Colorado as a single mom and orphan.   Since then she has successfully built a new life, and is now the CEO of a big-name company.

You need to be connected into a family way to mom.  You can as young or old as you want, but remember, you can operate a cellphone and your grandpa is still alive.

premise:
You've accepted a position, whether paid or through connections of personal interest, to an organization which stands between humanity and the unknown forces of the earth. 

While science has come to explain quite a bit, it relies on the ability to establish control environments and subjects, as well as eschews things beyond its range of testing capability. 

These things may one day have a scientific explanation, their mystery and influence denatured or debunked by a higher level of understanding, but today is not that day. Until such time that this changes, there's the ADD Agency...and you.

The agency is shrouded in mystery and secrecy, and Alex is eager to uncover the truth behind its operations. On their first day, Alex is introduced to the enigmatic leader of the agency, Dr. Hawthorne, who briefs them on the nature of the organization's work and the threats they face from the unexplained forces of the earth.







As Alex continued to dig deeper into the mysteries of the ADD Agency, they discovered a hidden chamber deep within the facility. Inside, they found ancient artifacts and texts that hinted at a connection between the agency and otherworldly entities. premise:
The year is 2030. Europolis, an agglomerate of European cities including Paris, Brussels, Antwerp and London, has become one giant urban area. It is the center of Europe attracting many immigrants while the rest of Europe slowly descends into anarchy and poverty. A web of high speed trains and highways both underground and above ground connects this sprawl in such a way as to make both business and crime transcend national boundaries. Administrative reforms tied the Europolis together adding yet another layer onto the already complicated bureaucracy that governs the European Union.

At the same time extreme weather, due to global warming, and energy shortages have made the world smaller in a way. Airliner companies went bankrupt, sea travel has become more dangerous and fewer people can afford things we used to take for granted like cars.

This new reality demanded a new agency ready to combat overarching security problems. The Agency was born. Local police forces and even national agencies of the UK, France and Belgium have to bow to a new small but very powerful police force. They are only brought in when the entire Europolis is threathened. Composed of the best the European union can offer, the players are brought together as part of a unit working together on one specific big case.

****************************************
Tense : Whatever you feel comfortable using but I myself prefer 3rd person past tense with some first person present tense thrown in for action scenes.

Language: the agency works in English but if you make a character that has a different primary language I encourage you to use it for small snippets where appropriate, google translate for the win!

Technology level : I would like to keep it somewhat realistic with only realistically extrapolated technology used

Tone and inspiration : I'm thinking of The Wire, Blacklist, Luther, Dexter, William Gibsons latest books for cyberpunk influences, etc. Mostly recent cop shows with a dark undertone basically.

Characters: You can make your own natures and other cards but I have provided some of my own for ideas.

Please use photos instead of drawings in case you use character portraits or want art for your nature, goal, weakness and strength cards. It fits more with the "TV show" vibe I'm trying to go for

****************************************
A devil's gambit is the first "episode" with the idea of creating a series called "the agency". This to combat player fatigue and to have a chance to periodically attract new blood.
story:

Outline: The novel begins with a brief history of Europolis and the creation of The Agency, a powerful police force tasked with maintaining security in the sprawling urban area. The main characters are introduced, each bringing their own unique skills and backgrounds to the team. The first case they are assigned is a high-profile kidnapping that threatens to unravel the delicate balance of power in Europolis.







Maria's journey into her past reveals the struggles and challenges that shaped her into the brilliant hacker she is today. premise: It is about two century since the world ended, you group of survivor have live deep underground in Haven, isolated from the world by meters of steel and lead. The water supply is going low and you have only enough food for a year. It is time to venture in the unknown … in the wild.
story:
Name: The Last Haven

Outline: The novel begins with a description of the world as it is now - a desolate, post-apocalyptic wasteland. The survivors have been living in an underground shelter called Haven for over two centuries, cut off from the outside world. The water supply is running low, and there is only enough food to last for a year. The leaders of Haven have decided that it is time to send a group of scouts to venture into the wild to search for a new source of water and food.







The scouts pressed on, their determination unwavering despite the desolation that surrounded them. They encountered fierce winds that threatened to push them off course, and rain that turned the ground into a muddy, slippery mess. The ruins of the old world proved to be both haunting and dangerous, with collapsed buildings and hidden pitfalls at every turn. But amidst the challenges, they also found signs of life - resilient plants pushing through the cracks in the pavement, and elusive animals that had adapted to the harsh new world. The scouts relied on their skills and each other, facing the trials of the wild with courage and perseverance. As they ventured further, they stumbled upon an abandoned settlement that hinted at the existence of other survivors, sparking a glimmer of hope within them. However, they also encountered a group of ruthless bandits who would stop at nothing to protect their territory, plunging the scouts into a dangerous confrontation. The scouts fought valiantly, using their resourcefulness and teamwork to outsmart the bandits and secure the vital resources they desperately needed.

The scouts, after their victory over the bandits, come across a map that points to a potential new water source and a fertile land. This discovery leads to heated discussions among the scouts about whether to share the information with the leaders of Haven or to keep it to themselves for the benefit of their own group. The decision they make will have far-reaching consequences for their future and the future of Haven. The heated discussions lead to deep divisions within the group, testing their loyalty and trust in one another. As they struggle to come to a consensus, they also face the challenges of surviving in the harsh and unforgiving wilderness, with limited supplies and the constant threat of other hostile groups. The internal conflict threatens to tear the scouts apart, and they must navigate the delicate balance between self-preservation and the greater good. The discovery of the map has also caught the attention of a mysterious figure who has been tracking the scouts from the shadows, waiting for the opportune moment to make their move. As tensions rise and the stakes become higher, the scouts must confront their own moral dilemmas and the harsh realities of the world they now inhabit.

The internal conflict within the group reaches a dangerous tipping point, leading to a perilous showdown that puts their mission and their lives at risk. The escalating confrontation forces the scouts to confront their deepest fears and insecurities, threatening to unravel the very fabric of their unity. The heated debates and bitter arguments have led to a dangerous division within the group, with trust waning and whispers of betrayal growing louder. As the scouts struggle to find common ground, they are also faced with the looming threat of other hostile groups and the harsh realities of the world they now inhabit. Seven characters, one murder. Who will survive?

A classic Agatha Christie style murder mystery! I will secretly choose one of you to be the murderer, so please do think up motives to murder!
story:
Name: The Deadly Manor

Outline: The novel begins with seven strangers receiving invitations to a mysterious manor in the English countryside. Each character has their own secrets and motives for accepting the invitation, and as they arrive, they quickly realize that they are all connected in some way. The manor is isolated, with no way to contact the outside world, and the guests are left to their own devices as they get to know each other and explore the sprawling estate.







The investigation intensified as the guests delved deeper into each other's backgrounds, unearthing dark secrets and hidden motives. The manor seemed to hold the key to the mystery, and they were determined to unlock its secrets before another tragedy struck. The tension and suspicion continued to mount as they raced against time to solve the mystery before it was too late. The guests found themselves becoming more and more paranoid as they struggled to trust one another, knowing that the murderer was still at large. The once opulent and inviting manor now felt suffocating and ominous, as if it was closing in on them, trapping them in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

The guests were plagued by a series of inexplicable events that only intensified their paranoia. They found themselves waking up in different parts of the manor without any recollection of how they got there, and strange symbols began appearing on the walls. The enigmatic artist, who had always been drawn to the occult, claimed that the symbols were part of a ritual to summon a malevolent spirit. As tensions continued to rise, the charming socialite, known for her psychic abilities, insisted that the manor was cursed. The guests were torn between skepticism and fear, and the once grand manor now felt like a prison. premise:
Going for a modern take on "The Most Dangerous Game" by Richard Connell. 

Maybe your plane crash-landed or your boat capsized but you've found yourself on an unmarked island in the Pacific. You and other survivors are left to either hope for rescue or make a life here; but there's a strange presence on the island that seems to have other ideas on how you will spend your stay.

Your character might begin to suspect someone intentionally orchestrated your becoming stranded here. The extensive wreckage, the island's seemingly nonexistence on any map, and other clues found upon arrival suggest something nefarious.  


______________________________

See the Trigger Warnings section for a quick link to the source material if you are unfamiliar with it. It's a short story and a fun read typically given to middle school students.
story:
Name: Hunted

Outline: After a plane crash, a group of survivors find themselves stranded on an unmarked island in the Pacific. They begin to suspect that someone intentionally orchestrated their arrival and that there is a strange presence on the island with nefarious intentions.

The sun beat down mercilessly on the survivors as they emerged from the wreckage of their crashed plane. The island was lush and green, with towering palm trees and the sound of crashing waves in the distance. But there was something unsettling about it, something that made the hairs on the back of their necks stand on end. As they surveyed the wreckage and the uninhabited island, they couldn't shake the feeling that they were being watched.

As they searched for food and water, the survivors found more and more evidence that their arrival on the island was no accident. The wreckage of their plane seemed too extensive, as if it had been deliberately scattered across the beach. And the island itself was nowhere to be found on any map they had access to. It was as if this place didn't exist, and they were left to wonder if they were the unwitting pawns in a sinister game.

As night fell, the survivors huddled together around a small fire, casting nervous glances into the darkness beyond. They couldn't shake the feeling that there was something out there, something that did not have their best interests at heart. It was as if the island itself was alive with a malevolent presence, and they knew that they would have to fight to survive.

The survivors cautiously entered the dark, foreboding cave, their torches casting long, eerie shadows on the walls. The air was cool and damp, and the sound of dripping water echoed through the chamber. As they ventured further into the depths of the cave, they stumbled upon ancient artifacts and evidence of a forgotten civilization. Intricate carvings adorned the walls, depicting scenes of ritualistic ceremonies and strange, otherworldly creatures. The survivors were filled with a sense of unease as they delved deeper, the oppressive weight of the darkness pressing down on them. Suddenly, they came face to face with a chilling revelation that changed everything they thought they knew about their predicament. 

The survivors cautiously entered the dark, foreboding cave, their torches casting long, eerie shadows on the walls. The air was cool and damp, and the sound of dripping water echoed through the chamber. As they ventured further into the depths of the cave, they stumbled upon ancient artifacts and evidence of a forgotten civilization. Intricate carvings adorned the walls, depicting scenes of ritualistic ceremonies and strange, otherworldly creatures. The survivors were filled with a sense of unease as they delved deeper, the oppressive weight of the darkness pressing down on them. Suddenly, they came face to face with a chilling revelation that changed everything they thought they knew about their predicament. The walls of the chamber were adorned with hieroglyphs and symbols, telling the story of an ancient civilization that once thrived on the island. The survivors realized that they were not the first to encounter the malevolent force that lurked within the shadows of the island. It became clear that the island held a dark secret, one that had been carefully hidden for centuries. The survivors were gripped with fear and curiosity as they pieced together the puzzle of the island's history. The revelation left them with more questions than answers, and they knew that they had only scratched the surface of the island's mysteries. They were determined to uncover the truth, no matter the cost. Little did they know, the malevolent force was watching their every move, biding its time to reveal its true nature and unleash its wrath upon the unsuspecting survivors.



The survivors' hearts raced as they stumbled upon a new group of people deep within the cave, their intentions unclear. Both groups eyed each other warily, unsure whether to trust or view each other as threats. Tensions rose as they navigated the delicate balance between cooperation and suspicion, ultimately leading to a critical decision that would shape their fates on the island. The new group appeared to be just as desperate and lost as the survivors, but there was an air of secrecy about them that set off alarm bells in the survivors' minds. The two groups cautiously exchanged stories of how they ended up on the island, each side weighing the other's words for any signs of deception. As they cautiously interacted, it became clear that the stakes were high, and the island's secrets were more dangerous than they could have ever imagined.

As the survivors grappled with Kai's shocking revelation, they realized that they were on the cusp of a discovery that could change everything they thought they knew about the island and its history. Determined to uncover the truth, they embarked on a dangerous expedition deep into the heart of the island, facing unexpected challenges and unearthed more secrets along the way. As they delved further into the island's depths, they encountered a series of harrowing trials that tested their resolve and brought them face to face with the malevolent force that had held the island captive for centuries. The survivors were pushed to their limits as they fought to unravel the dark mysteries of the island, leading to a climactic confrontation with the forces that sought to keep its secrets buried.

The survivors pressed on through the treacherous terrain, their determination unwavering in the face of the unknown. As they ventured deeper into the heart of the island, they uncovered more ancient artifacts and cryptic symbols that hinted at the island's dark and mysterious past. The air was thick with tension as they navigated through the labyrinthine passages, their senses heightened as they searched for clues that would unlock the island's secrets. The survivors found themselves in a constant battle for survival, both against the elements and the malevolent force that seemed to be watching their every move. Each step they took deeper into the heart of the island brought them closer to the truth, but also closer to the lurking danger that threatened to consume them. The ancient symbols in the hidden chamber took on a new significance as they struggled to decipher their meaning, each character holding the key to unlocking the island's secrets. Sarah, the leader of the survivors, felt a sense of urgency unlike anything she had ever experienced before, her determination unwavering in the face of the unknown. The survivors' bond was tested as they faced one harrowing trial after another, their trust in each other the only thing keeping them from succumbing to the darkness that threatened to overwhelm them. The island seemed to pulse with a malevolent energy, its very heartbeat echoing the secrets it harbored within its depths. And as they delved deeper, the survivors realized that they were not just fighting for their own lives, but for the very soul of the island itself.



The survivors continued to delve deeper into the heart of the island, their determination unwavering in the face of the unknown. With every step, they uncovered more ancient artifacts and cryptic symbols that hinted at the island's dark and mysterious past. The air was thick with tension as they navigated through the labyrinthine passages, their senses heightened as they searched for clues that would unlock the island's secrets. They found themselves in a constant battle for survival, both against the elements and the malevolent force that seemed to be watching their every move. Each new discovery drew them closer to the truth but also closer to the lurking danger that threatened to consume them. As they struggled to decipher the ancient symbols in the hidden chamber, the urgency to unravel the island's secrets became more palpable. The survivors' bond was tested as they faced one harrowing trial after another, their trust in each other the only thing keeping them from succumbing to the darkness that threatened to overwhelm them. The malevolent energy pulsing through the island seemed to grow stronger with each passing moment, driving the survivors to confront the force that held the island captive. Their determination to uncover the truth only intensified as they raced against time to put an end to the malevolent force's reign of terror.

The survivors convened a meeting to discuss the implications of the ominous prophecy, their hearts heavy with the weight of the revelation. Sarah, the leader, struggled to maintain a sense of composure as she addressed the group, her voice trembling with emotion. Tensions ran high as the survivors debated the best course of action, each member grappling with the overwhelming responsibility that had been thrust upon them. The once unwavering bond between the survivors was tested as doubts and fears threatened to drive a wedge between them. In the midst of the heated discussions, Kai, the enigmatic member of the new group, stepped forward with a plan that could potentially alter the fate of the island. His proposal sparked a glimmer of hope within the group, but also raised questions about the true nature of the malevolent force that lurked within the island. As the survivors grappled with conflicting emotions and uncertainties, they knew that the time had come to make a decision that would shape the course of their lives and the destiny of the island itself.

The cryptic symbol they uncovered in the hidden temple seemed to pulse with an otherworldly energy, casting an eerie glow that sent shivers down their spines. As Sarah and Kai delved deeper into the meaning of the symbol, a revelation began to unfold before their eyes, shedding light on the true nature of the malevolent force that had plagued the island for centuries. The ancient texts and artifacts took on a new significance as they pieced together the puzzle that could hold the key to the island's salvation. With each passing moment, the whispers of the past grew louder, urging them to uncover the truth before it was too late. The bond between Sarah and Kai strengthened as they worked tirelessly to unravel the island's secrets, their determination unwavering in the face of the unknown. And as they delved deeper into the heart of the temple, they knew that they were on the brink of a revelation that could alter the course of their lives and the destiny of the island itself.

premise:
*Genre: Thriller. Players: 3-4*

Frank Wilton destroyed your life.

How? Maybe he murdered your child. He burned your business to the ground. Your husband is now locked up in a mental hospital after what Frank put him through. He attempted to murder you and badly burned you in the process.

The fact is, Frank's a very bad man. He's done unspeakably bad things.

And now, you've got caught him. Your little circle of vigilantes have him in a dingy basement, handcuffed to a chair. Letting him go, of course, is out of the question. Now the only question is: Phone the cops? Or pull the trigger?

Most of this game will take place in the basement. And every time, there will be three challenges.


**The Gun**. Shoot Frank. Kill him for everything he's done.

**The Phone**. Call the police. Maybe make him confess on the line. But bring them in and get him locked up.

**Investigate further**. This isn't enough. You need to know more. Maybe this means looking through all the files you found. Maybe it means interrogating him. And this opens up new scenes. Flashback to other times and places. Ring up people you need to talk to. Get Frank to open up about his life. Find all the evidence you need to make a choice. After all, he's not going anywhere.

But sooner or later, you will need to make a choice.

The phone, or the gun?

**Mechanics**

There is a single central scene that I will keep returning to: The characters in the basement with the gun and the phone. But that scene always has three challenges: The gun, the phone, and investigate. Whichever one is resolved first wins out, and the person playing the final card resolves the whole story. But before then? You can keep on investigating as many times as you want to help you reach a decision. Investigations may mean looking over papers, it may mean flashbacks, they can be for you guys or for Frank. Any number of options.

I'm also going to request that, while in the basement, players submit no more than one card per move, and do not make multiple moves in a row.

**Character Generation**

I've included a four cards in each slot, but please, please feel free to make new ones. You'll notice that 'natures' is basically "What Frank Did To You", while subplots is "What You Want to Do to Frank". This game will be very tightly focused, so there's not a lot of room for personal subplots.

premise: In this city, carved up by vampires, werewolves, and wizards, everyone gets dirty. Whatever you want, you've got to go through someone to get it. That means choosing friends and that means making enemies. Just hope you get out of this life without becoming a ghost — because no one wants to linger in this city that long. This modern fantasy deck depicts a gritty cast of characters in a hard-luck city in need of help.
story:
Name: Shadows of the City

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the gritty city where vampires, werewolves, and wizards hold power. The main character, a young human named Alex, is struggling to survive in this dangerous world. He is trying to make a living by doing odd jobs for the supernatural beings, but he knows he is always one step away from becoming a victim himself.







Alex's decision to join the resistance group fills him with a newfound sense of determination and purpose. As he trains with the group and learns more about their cause, he becomes increasingly committed to seeking justice for his parents and making a difference in the city. However, the supernatural beings are not blind to the resistance group's activities, and Alex finds himself facing even greater danger as he becomes more deeply involved in the fight against the oppressive rule of the vampires, werewolves, and wizards. Mei, the group's leader, takes Alex under her wing and becomes a mentor to him, teaching him the skills he needs to survive and thrive in the dangerous world they inhabit. As Alex becomes more skilled and confident, he begins to uncover secrets about the supernatural beings and their hold on the city, leading him to question everything he thought he knew about the world he lives in.

Mei's revelation about her tragic past and the personal reasons driving her dedication to the resistance group's cause struck a chord deep within Alex. Her words ignited a fire within him to become even more deeply involved in the fight. As he listened to Mei's story, he felt a deep sense of empathy and understanding for her cause, and he knew that he couldn't turn away from the battle that had become so personal to both of them. Mei's strength and determination inspired Alex to push himself further, to train harder, and to become a more integral part of the resistance group. He was no longer just seeking justice for his parents; he was now fighting for Mei, for himself, and for all those who had suffered under the rule of the supernatural beings. With Mei's guidance and mentorship, Alex delved deeper into the secrets of the city, uncovering layers of deceit and manipulation that had been hidden from the human population for far too long. His determination to bring about change grew stronger with each passing day, and he knew that there was no turning back from the path he had chosen.

Mei and Alex, along with the rest of the resistance group, meticulously planned the daring mission to gather evidence against the oppressive rulers of the city. They knew the risks involved, but their determination was unwavering. As they ventured into the heart of the supernatural rulers' domain, they faced powerful adversaries and intricate traps that threatened to derail their mission. However, Mei's strategic mind and Alex's unwavering determination kept the group focused on their ultimate goal. The journey was fraught with danger, but they were willing to risk it all for the chance to free the city from the clutches of the supernatural beings.

As Alex grapples with the shocking revelation from his father's journal, he struggles with the decision of whether to reveal the truth to Mei and the rest of the resistance group. The weight of this knowledge threatens to unravel the group's plans and jeopardize their mission. Meanwhile, the supernatural rulers of the city grow increasingly suspicious of the resistance group's activities, leading to heightened security measures and a growing sense of urgency. As the group prepares to execute their daring mission, Alex finds himself torn between his allegiance to the resistance and the newfound secrets that could change everything.

As the supernatural rulers tighten their grip on the city, the resistance group faces a wave of escalating attacks and surveillance, pushing them to reevaluate their tactics and fortify their defenses. Amidst the growing turmoil, Alex and Mei must navigate a treacherous path, balancing the need for secrecy with the urgency of their mission, as they prepare to confront the looming threat head-on. The city's pulse quickens with anticipation, as the resistance group stands on the brink of a perilous journey that will challenge their resolve and reshape their destinies. Alex's internal conflict deepens as he grapples with the implications of his father's revelations, questioning his own identity and struggling to reconcile his past with his present. The atmosphere within the resistance group becomes tense as the stakes grow higher, and trust becomes a fragile commodity. Mei, sensing the growing unease within the group, takes it upon herself to rally their spirits and reinforce their commitment to the cause. As the group faces the escalating threats from the supernatural rulers, they are forced to adapt and evolve their strategies, delving deeper into the heart of the city's darkness while also confronting the shadows of their own pasts. The bond between Mei and Alex is tested as they navigate the treacherous path ahead, each grappling with their own demons and insecurities.

Alex and Mei, driven by the urgency of the escalating threats, embark on a perilous quest to find a legendary artifact rumored to hold the power to defeat the supernatural rulers. Their journey takes them to the darkest and most dangerous corners of the city, where they encounter formidable adversaries and uncover long-forgotten secrets that will test their resolve and bond. As they navigate the treacherous terrain, they encounter ancient guardians and mystical creatures that stand in their way, each presenting a unique challenge that pushes their skills and determination to the limit. The artifact's location remains shrouded in mystery, leading them to seek guidance from enigmatic allies and unravel cryptic clues that point to its hidden whereabouts. Alex and Mei's bond is tested as they confront the perils of their quest, facing not only external threats but also the internal conflicts that arise from the weight of their shared destiny. The city's pulse quickens with anticipation, as rumors of the resistance group's daring mission spread, drawing the attention of both allies and adversaries. The resistance group stands on the brink of a perilous journey that will challenge their resolve and reshape their destinies, as they prepare to confront the looming threat head-on. The stakes have never been higher, and the fate of the city hangs in the balance as they venture into the heart of darkness.



The underground tunnels proved to be a labyrinth of elemental challenges, each representing a different aspect of the city's history and the supernatural rulers' origins. As they ventured deeper, Alex and Mei encountered trials that tested their resilience and provided crucial insights into the ancient prophecy and the true nature of the artifact. The first challenge manifested as a raging inferno, a symbol of the supernatural rulers' thirst for power and destruction. The second trial took the form of an icy maze, reflecting the rulers' cold and calculated nature. The third challenge emerged as a tempest of swirling winds, representing the ever-changing political landscape of the city. Amidst these trials, they uncovered shocking revelations that reshaped their understanding of the city's history and the forces at play, setting the stage for the final confrontation with the supernatural rulers.

As they approached the artifact's final resting place, Alex and Mei stumbled upon a hidden chamber concealed within the depths of the underground tunnels. Inside, they discovered ancient scrolls that unveiled the prophecy in its entirety, shedding light on the true nature of their quest. However, the shocking twist revealed in the scrolls casts doubt on their mission, forcing them to reassess their goals and allegiances. This unexpected revelation challenged their resolve and set the stage for a pivotal turning point in their journey. The scrolls revealed that the artifact was not a weapon to defeat the supernatural rulers, but rather a key to restoring balance between the mortal and supernatural realms. This revelation left them questioning the true intentions of Elder Kael and the resistance group, as they grappled with the realization that their entire quest may have been based on a misunderstanding. As they emerged from the hidden chamber, they found themselves at a crossroads, uncertain of their next move and the implications of the newfound knowledge.

The tension between Alex and Mei reaches a boiling point as they confront the implications of their newfound knowledge. Their conflicting beliefs and uncertainties about their true purpose threaten to drive them apart, creating a palpable tension as they navigate the treacherous underground tunnels. As they grapple with their internal conflict, the weight of their doubts and the uncertainty of their path seem to grow heavier with each step forward. The once unbreakable bond between them now seems fragile, foreshadowing a critical decision that could alter the course of their journey and the fate of the city. With the supernatural rulers tightening their grip on the city, the resistance group faces escalating attacks and surveillance, forcing them to reevaluate their tactics and fortify their defenses. The atmosphere within the resistance group becomes tense as the stakes grow higher, and trust becomes a fragile commodity. The bond between Mei and Alex is tested as they navigate the treacherous path ahead, each grappling with their own demons and insecurities. As they stand on the brink of a perilous journey that will challenge their resolve and reshape their destinies, the city's pulse quickens with anticipation.

premise:
For 70 years, a war has been waged within the city of Aquarius. The Houses, created as strongholds for the fallen Angellum after the Aura Wars, are constantly vying for dominance. Now only four of the oldest and most powerful Houses remain: Irydthion, Ya Mordül, Kyle, and Halcyon Kept.

The war between Houses has taken a sudden, unexpected turn. Creatures unlike anything ever seen before have appeared, attacking all Houses without discretion, wielding technology equally as alien. Time is short on all sides. Each House begins to strenghten its military force in response to these new enemies. The race is on to discover the origins of these creatures, and all the while the tensions between Houses continue to mount until the breaking point becomes inevitable.

Navigating through politcal struggles and internal deception, agents from each House discover that the strange creatures are only the newest development in a war so ancient and vast that it dwarfs their comprehension of time. Defeat of this new and deadly enemy is more than any House can handle on its own, and an alliance with the other Houses could be the deciding factor. But can an alliance between four powers with intermingled histories of prejudice and violence even be possible?
story:
Name: The War of Aquarius

Outline: The first chapter will introduce the city of Aquarius, a once prosperous city now torn apart by a war between the four powerful Houses. The chapter will also introduce the sudden appearance of strange creatures attacking the Houses, leading to a new level of urgency and desperation. The chapter will end with the realization that the only hope for survival lies in forming an alliance between the Houses.







The agents from each House embarked on a dangerous journey, venturing into uncharted territories in search of knowledge that could potentially save Aquarius from destruction. The quest for knowledge became a race against time as the creatures continued their relentless attacks, leaving behind a trail of devastation and death. Despite countless dangers and obstacles, the agents pressed on, driven by the hope that the answers they sought would ultimately lead to a chance at survival for their beloved city. As they grappled with the weight of responsibility and the realization that the fate of Aquarius rested on their shoulders, each discovery brought them closer to the truth. However, it also unveiled the dark and twisted history of the Houses, revealing secrets that had long been buried and forgotten. The alliance that was once deemed impossible now seemed within reach, but the agents knew that their greatest challenge was yet to come.

The agents, having faced countless dangers and obstacles, finally unearthed ancient relics and texts that hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the creatures and their connection to the Houses' history. As they grappled with the consequences of wielding such powerful knowledge, they also confronted the darker side of their own Houses, forcing them to embark on a journey of self-discovery and redemption. Amidst the chaos and destruction, a glimmer of hope began to emerge - the hope that their efforts would not be in vain, and that the alliance between the Houses could indeed become a reality.

The agents knew that their greatest challenge was yet to come as they faced internal conflicts and external threats, navigating treacherous political landscapes and confronting the ghosts of the past. The relics and texts they discovered revealed ancient prophecies that spoke of a time when the Houses would need to put aside their differences and unite against a common enemy. This revelation sparked a new sense of purpose within the agents, as they realized that their mission was not just about uncovering the past, but also about shaping the future of Aquarius. However, as they began to contemplate the possibility of an alliance, they also faced skepticism and resistance from within their own ranks. Old rivalries and grudges threatened to undermine their efforts, and they soon realized that their greatest challenge was not just the external threats, but the internal conflicts that had been simmering beneath the surface for generations. The agents knew that they would need to navigate treacherous political landscapes and confront the ghosts of the past if they were to have any hope of bringing the Houses together. And so, as they prepared to take the next step in their journey, they knew that the path ahead would be fraught with peril, but they also held onto the glimmer of hope that had ignited within them.

As the agents continued to ponder the possibility of an alliance between the Houses, a new threat emerged, casting a shadow over the fragile hope that had begun to take root. This threat came in the form of a mysterious figure, shrouded in darkness, who seemed to possess knowledge and abilities far beyond anything they had encountered before. As they grappled with the looming presence of this new danger, they also faced internal conflicts that threatened to undermine their efforts. The relics and texts they had discovered revealed ancient prophecies that spoke of a time when the Houses would need to put aside their differences and unite against a common enemy, and the agents realized that their mission was not just about uncovering the past, but also about shaping the future of Aquarius. However, the skepticism and resistance from within their own ranks only intensified in the face of this new threat, as old rivalries and grudges threatened to tear the fragile hope apart. The agents knew that they would need to confront the ghosts of the past and navigate treacherous political landscapes while dealing with this new danger if they were to have any hope of bringing the Houses together.

The mysterious figure, cloaked in darkness, led the agents on a perilous journey through the darkest corners of the city's history, forcing them to confront their own inner demons. As they delved into the ancient ruins and deciphered cryptic clues, they encountered unimaginable challenges that tested their resolve and resourcefulness. Each discovery brought them closer to unlocking the secrets that could turn the tide of the war, but it also revealed the darker side of their own Houses, forcing them to confront uncomfortable truths and long-buried sins. The agents knew that their greatest challenge was yet to come as they faced internal conflicts and external threats, navigating treacherous political landscapes and confronting the ghosts of the past. The relics and texts they had discovered revealed ancient prophecies that spoke of a time when the Houses would need to put aside their differences and unite against a common enemy. This revelation sparked a new sense of purpose within the agents, as they realized that their mission was not just about uncovering the past, but also about shaping the future of Aquarius. However, as they contemplated the possibility of an alliance, they also faced skepticism and resistance from within their own ranks, with old rivalries and grudges threatening to undermine their efforts.

The agents cautiously made their way through the treacherous depths of the ancient ruins, their hearts pounding with a mixture of fear and determination. As they ventured deeper, the air grew thick with an otherworldly energy, sending shivers down their spines. Suddenly, the ground rumbled beneath their feet, and a deafening roar echoed through the darkness. With weapons drawn and nerves of steel, they faced the formidable ancient creature that stood guard over the long-forgotten artifact. The creature, with eyes ablaze and scales shimmering in the dim light, unleashed a series of devastating attacks, testing the agents' courage and resourcefulness. Despite the overwhelming odds, they refused to back down, drawing upon their unwavering resolve and the unbreakable bond that had formed between them. With each calculated move and strategic maneuver, they inched closer to the artifact, determined to claim it as their own.

The agents, having deciphered the cryptic message, embarked on a perilous journey through the hidden chamber deep within the ruins. There, they uncovered a series of ancient relics that hold the key to unlocking the true nature of the creatures and their connection to the Houses' history. However, they soon realized that they were not the only ones seeking these relics, as they encountered unexpected adversaries who will stop at nothing to claim the power hidden within the ancient artifacts. As tensions rose and the stakes became higher, the agents navigated a web of deceit, betrayal, and danger in their quest to uncover the truth and secure the artifacts for the future of Aquarius.

The agents, having successfully secured the ancient artifact, are now faced with the daunting task of deciphering the true nature of the relic and its connection to the Houses' history. As they grapple with the moral implications of wielding such power, tensions escalate between the rival Houses who are determined to control the artifacts for their own agendas. This internal struggle will test the agents' resolve and force them to make difficult decisions that will shape the future of Aquarius.

The agents, having successfully secured the ancient artifact, are now faced with the daunting task of deciphering the true nature of the relic and its connection to the Houses' history. As they grapple with the moral implications of wielding such power, tensions escalate between the rival Houses who are determined to control the artifacts for their own agendas. This internal struggle will test the agents' resolve and force them to make difficult decisions that will shape the future of Aquarius. The air was heavy with uncertainty as they deliberated on their next steps, knowing that the fate of the city hung in the balance. Each agent carried the weight of their own doubts and fears, unsure of the consequences of their actions. As they sought to understand the ancient artifact, they found themselves delving into the archives of each House, uncovering secrets and long-forgotten histories that shed light on the true nature of the relics. The more they learned, the more they realized the magnitude of the power they held in their hands, and the potential for both salvation and destruction. With each passing day, the tension between the rival Houses grew, and the agents knew that they needed allies in their quest to protect the artifacts and prevent them from falling into the wrong hands. It was a race against time as they reached out to influential figures within each House, hoping to find common ground and form an alliance that could withstand the growing threats and tensions.

As tensions escalate between the rival Houses, the agents find themselves facing a new and unexpected threat—a group of rogue agents from a previously unknown fifth House, determined to steal the artifacts. This forces the agents to defend their discoveries and embark on a dangerous journey to uncover the mysteries of the elusive fifth House, leading to unforeseen challenges and revelations. As they delve deeper into the city's history, they encounter ancient prophecies and cryptic messages that hint at a dark and powerful force lurking in the shadows. The agents must navigate a treacherous path, where loyalties are tested, and betrayals threaten to tear them apart. In the midst of this turmoil, they uncover a secret alliance between the Houses, forged with the intent to manipulate the artifacts for their own gain. With time running out, the agents race against the clock to decipher the true nature of the relics and prevent them from falling into the wrong hands. As they confront the fifth House, they discover the shocking truth behind its existence and the role it plays in the city's tumultuous history.

premise:
Jonas Clip is looking for those willing to join a small party to investigate a find in the Iranian Desert! Be warned: not for the faint of heart or stomach as there will be many dangers along the way as you search for the Ark of the Covenant!

Misc notes:
Each use of a weapon card is considered using a single magazine in the weapon.
story:
Name: The Search for the Covenant

Outline: Jonas Clip is a renowned archaeologist who has spent years searching for the Ark of the Covenant. He believes he has finally found a lead in the Iranian Desert and is looking for a small party to join him on this dangerous expedition. The group will face many dangers along the way, including hostile locals, treacherous terrain, and the possibility of encountering ancient traps.







The group's bond grew stronger as they relied on each other for support and guidance, forming an unbreakable camaraderie forged in the crucible of their quest. And as they delved deeper into the heart of the desert, they knew that the greatest challenges and revelations still lay ahead. The shifting sands seemed to whisper ancient secrets, and the group felt an inexplicable pull towards a distant, shimmering oasis. However, as they approached the oasis, they were met with a sight that sent chills down their spines - a towering, ancient structure rising from the sands, its entrance guarded by intricate carvings and symbols. It was a testament to the power and mystery that surrounded the Ark of the Covenant. With trepidation and excitement, the group ventured into the structure, facing a labyrinth of traps and riddles that tested their wits and courage. Each step brought them closer to the heart of the structure, and closer to the elusive Ark. But as they delved deeper, they couldn't shake the feeling that they were not alone, that something ancient and powerful was watching their every move. The group pressed on, their determination unwavering, as they braced themselves for the challenges that awaited them in the heart of the structure.

The mysterious figure led the group through a series of winding corridors, each one filled with ancient carvings and symbols that seemed to pulse with an otherworldly energy. As they walked, the figure spoke of the guardians of the Ark, their sworn duty to protect it from those unworthy, and the trials that awaited the group if they were to prove themselves. The group listened intently, their senses heightened by the palpable aura of power that surrounded them. Finally, they reached the heart of the structure, where the figure revealed the first trial - a chamber filled with riddles and puzzles that tested the mind and spirit. With determination and quick thinking, the group tackled each challenge, their bond growing stronger with every obstacle they overcame. As they emerged from the chamber, they were met with a new set of challenges, each one more perilous than the last. The figure's true intentions remained shrouded in mystery, adding an air of danger and uncertainty to the group's quest. With the fate of the Ark hanging in the balance, the group knew they had to proceed, even as the shadows of the structure seemed to whisper warnings of the trials yet to come.

The mysterious figure's true identity is finally revealed, shocking the group to its core. As tensions rise within the group, suspicions about the figure's motives come to a head, leading to a confrontation that uncovers shocking truths about the figure's hidden agenda. The revelation not only tests the group's unity but also sheds light on the greater forces at play in their quest for the Ark of the Covenant. The group grapples with the aftermath of the revelation, struggling to come to terms with the deceit and betrayal they have faced. As they navigate the treacherous corridors of the ancient structure, the group's bond is tested like never before, and they must find a way to overcome the rift that has been created. In the midst of the turmoil, they uncover clues that hint at a larger conspiracy surrounding the Ark, drawing them into a web of intrigue and danger that threatens to consume them. With the figure's true intentions laid bare, the group must reevaluate their mission and their trust in each other as they face the trials that still lie ahead.

The group, still reeling from the shocking revelation of the mysterious figure's true identity, found themselves in a state of disarray. Tensions ran high as suspicions and doubts gnawed at their once unbreakable bond. Each member grappled with the aftermath in their own way, struggling to come to terms with the deceit and betrayal they had faced. As they navigated the treacherous corridors of the ancient structure, their footsteps echoed with the weight of their collective burden. The group's unity, once their greatest strength, now seemed fragile, hanging by a thread. They knew they had to find a way to overcome the rift that had been created, but the path forward seemed uncertain and fraught with danger. In the midst of the turmoil, they stumbled upon a new ally within the structure, a figure cloaked in mystery who offered to help them navigate the remaining trials and tribulations. However, the ally's true motives remained shrouded in secrecy, adding an additional layer of complexity to the group's already perilous quest. With the figure's true intentions laid bare, the group must reevaluate their mission and their trust in each other as they face the trials that still lie ahead.

The group delves deep into the ancient archives, uncovering shocking truths that add a new layer of complexity to their mission. As they navigate the treacherous corridors of the ancient structure, they uncover long-buried secrets that threaten to tear the group apart. Amidst the chaos, a boiling point of tension is reached as conflicting loyalties and hidden agendas come to the fore. The group must navigate a web of lies and deception, all while grappling with their own inner demons. As they inch closer to the truth, they realize that the stakes of their mission are higher than they ever could have imagined, and the consequences of their choices will reverberate far beyond the confines of the ancient structure.

However, as they delved deeper into the heart of the structure, the ally's ulterior motives became increasingly apparent. The group found themselves in unforeseen peril, facing harrowing challenges and treacherous obstacles that tested their resolve like never before. The figure's guidance led them into a confrontation with a malevolent force lurking within the depths of the structure, forcing the group to fight for their survival. As the battle raged on, the true extent of the ally's betrayal became clear, shattering the group's trust and plunging them into a desperate struggle for escape. The group's once unbreakable bond was put to the ultimate test as they fought to overcome the treachery that threatened to consume them. In the face of overwhelming adversity, the group must find a way to navigate the perilous labyrinth and uncover the secrets that hold the key to their survival.

premise:
Someone has stolen the heart of the mob boss's son.

No, really, they stole his heart, ripped it out in his sleep. His father is offering a large sum of money to any adventurers who would be brave enough to find his son's heart...and take his son with them. Although, you feel as though there is another piece of the puzzle to be uncovered...

Protect the son of the mob boss, a nervous vampire teen who flees from every danger. Find his heart. Dodge attempted kidnappings, and maybe make a few of your own. After all, kidnapping the mob boss's son would be a good way to make money...or maybe not. The path is yours to decide.

(Pre-made characters available!)
story:
Name: The Heart of the Mob

Outline: The novel begins with the introduction of the mob boss's son, a nervous vampire teen named Luca. His heart has been stolen, and his father is offering a large sum of money to anyone who can find his son's heart and bring Luca back to safety. The protagonist, an adventurous individual, takes on the challenge and sets out to find Luca's heart and protect him from danger. As they begin their journey, they quickly realize that there is more to the situation than meets the eye.







The tension between the protagonist and the rival group reached a boiling point, with both sides vying for the upper hand in the race to find Luca's heart. As the confrontation escalated, a surprising turn of events unfolded, setting the stage for an unexpected twist in the protagonist's mission. Just as the situation seemed to reach a breaking point, a mysterious figure emerged from the shadows, offering a cryptic warning that hinted at a deeper conspiracy at play. The protagonist's instincts told them that this encounter would change everything, and they were determined to uncover the truth, no matter the cost. With the stakes higher than ever, the protagonist knew that they had to stay one step ahead of the rival group and the criminal elements lurking in every corner. The city's underbelly was a dangerous place, and the protagonist had to navigate through a maze of treachery and betrayal. Their resolve was tested like never before, but they were determined to unravel the mystery surrounding Luca's missing heart. 

The mysterious figure led the protagonist on a perilous journey through the city's hidden underbelly, revealing shocking truths about the heart theft and the powerful forces at play. As they delved deeper into the dark and dangerous corners of the city, the protagonist couldn't shake off the feeling that they were being watched, that every step they took was bringing them closer to a truth more sinister than they had ever imagined. The mysterious figure, shrouded in shadows, seemed to possess an uncanny knowledge of the city's secrets, leading the protagonist through narrow alleyways and abandoned buildings, each step unraveling a new layer of the conspiracy. Along the way, they encountered individuals who had been affected by the heart theft, each with their own story to tell, each adding a piece to the puzzle that the protagonist was desperately trying to solve. The city's underbelly proved to be a labyrinth of deceit and danger, and the protagonist found themselves entangled in a web of lies and betrayal that seemed to reach the highest echelons of power. The shocking truths they uncovered threatened to shatter everything they thought they knew, and the protagonist realized that they were in deeper than they had ever anticipated. The journey with the mysterious figure was just the beginning of a harrowing ordeal that would test the protagonist's resolve and their very understanding of the world they thought they knew.

The protagonist and their allies strategize a daring rescue mission to retrieve Luca's heart from the clutches of the powerful forces. They must navigate through a series of challenges and obstacles, all while uncovering the true motives behind the heart theft. The mission will test their courage, loyalty, and determination as they confront the dangerous forces at play. As they plan their next move, the protagonist becomes increasingly suspicious of the mysterious figure and their true intentions. The city's underbelly is a labyrinth of treachery, and the protagonist knows they must tread carefully to avoid falling into the traps set by their enemies. With the stakes higher than ever, the protagonist and their allies prepare to face the powerful forces head-on, knowing that failure is not an option. The city's dark secrets are slowly unraveling, revealing a complex web of deceit and betrayal that goes far beyond what they had imagined. The protagonist's resolve is put to the ultimate test as they delve deeper into the heart of the city, determined to uncover the truth and bring Luca back to safety.

As the protagonist and their allies delve deeper into the heart of the city, they uncover clues that lead to the shocking revelation of the mysterious figure's true identity. This revelation will test the protagonist's loyalty and trust, forcing them to confront the truth in ways they never anticipated. The mysterious figure's true identity is finally revealed to be none other than Luca's estranged brother, Marco, who has been orchestrating the heart theft to gain power and control over the city. The protagonist and their allies are stunned by this revelation, realizing that they have been played all along by someone they trusted. Marco's sinister plan comes to light as he captures the protagonist and reveals his true intentions, leaving them in a perilous situation. The protagonist must now find a way to escape and stop Marco from carrying out his nefarious scheme, all while protecting Luca and bringing him back to safety. The city's dark underbelly becomes even more treacherous as the protagonist faces their greatest challenge yet, and the fate of the entire city hangs in the balance.

Luca's inner turmoil and struggle to come to terms with Marco's betrayal led him to make a pivotal decision that would shape the course of the mission. As he grappled with the weight of his brother's treachery, Luca found himself at a crossroads, torn between seeking vengeance and preserving the bond they once shared. His emotional journey set the stage for a dramatic confrontation with Marco, as well as paved the way for unexpected alliances and revelations in the upcoming chapters. The fate of the city and the safety of his own heart hung in the balance, and Luca knew that the choices he made would have far-reaching consequences. With a heavy heart and a determined spirit, Luca embarked on a path that would test his resolve and push him to the brink of his capabilities. It was a journey that would lead him to the darkest corners of the city, where he would confront not only his brother but also the demons that lurked within himself. As he grappled with conflicting emotions and the burden of his newfound knowledge, Luca's every step became a battle between loyalty and justice, love and retribution.

As the protagonist and their allies strategize a daring rescue mission to retrieve Luca's heart from the clutches of Marco, they face a series of challenges and obstacles, uncovering the true motives behind the heart theft. The mission tests their courage, loyalty, and determination as they confront the dangerous forces at play.
